ultimates.name: Borrowed Time
ultimates.desc:
When activated, all damage dealt to you will heal instead of harm. Most negative buffs will also be removed. If the ability is not on cooldown, it will automatically activate if your health falls below 400.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

scepter.desc: Increases duration. While Borrowed Time is active, anytime an ally takes more than 525 damage while within 1600 range of Abaddon, an individual Mist Coil will automatically fire towards that ally.

ultimates.name: Chemical Rage
ultimates.desc:
Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and health regeneration.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

ultimates.name: Ice Blast
ultimates.desc: Launches a tracer toward any location on the battlefield, which must be triggered again to mark the area to be blasted by a damaging explosion of hail. The further the tracer travels, the larger the explosion will be. Enemies caught in the explosion, or who touch the icy ball of hail as it travels, are Frostbitten, taking damage and prevented from regenerating or healing. If a Frostbitten unit's health drops below a certain percentage, they will instantly shatter.

ultimates.name: Mana Void
ultimates.desc: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies.  The main target is also mini-stunned.

ultimates.name: Culling Blade
ultimates.desc: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, instantly killing an enemy unit with low health, or dealing moderate damage otherwise. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, and Axe and nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed.

ultimates.name: Fiend's Grip
ultimates.desc: CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every 0.5 seconds based on the unit's maximum mana.

scepter.desc: Reduces Fiend's Grip cooldown by 45 seconds. Fiend's Grip now creates two uncontrollable illusions that are also channeling Fiend's Grip on the target. Illusions takes 700% incoming damage and immediately dies if they are interrupted. Damage does not stack.

ultimates.name: Flaming Lasso
ultimates.desc: Lassoes an enemy and drags them in Batrider's wake.  Victims cannot be dragged over impassable terrain. Dragged units cannot move, attack, or use abilities.  Teleporting or blinking will break the lasso.

shard.desc: Allows Flaming Lasso to be cast on an allied hero, granting them 80% damage reduction. Has 20 second cooldown when used on allies.

scepter.desc: Flaming Lasso grabs both its target, as well as the target's nearest allied hero within range. The secondary target is tethered to the first.

ultimates.name: Primal Roar
ultimates.desc: Beastmaster lets loose a deafening roar that stuns, and shoves open a path to its target. All units in the path of the roar are damaged, while units shoved aside by the roar have their movement and attack speed slowed. Additionally, Beastmaster and his units gain 40% movement speed for 3 seconds.

shard.desc: Causes anyone that attacks a Primal Roar target to deal 1.3x Critical Strike.

ultimates.name: Rupture
ultimates.desc: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture, dealing initial damage based on its current health. If the unit moves, it takes damage based on the distance moved.  The damage is dealt through spell immunity.

scepter.desc: Grants Bloodseeker two charges of Rupture

ultimates.name: Track
ultimates.desc: Tracks an enemy hero, granting True Sight of the target, and information on how much gold it is carrying. Bounty Hunter moves fast when near the tracked unit and deals critical strikes when attacking it. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bonus bounty of gold. Casting Track does not take you out of invisibility.

shard.desc: Allows Track to be ground targeted, creating a Bear Trap. After 3 seconds, the trap becomes invisible and active. Walking over the trap applies Track. Traps have 400 vision. Max Traps: 8. Ground targeting with Track has bonus 1200 range.

ultimates.name: Primal Split
ultimates.desc: Splits Brewmaster into elements, forming 3 specialized warriors, adept at survival, each with their own abilities. If any of them survive until the end of their summoned timer, the Brewmaster is reborn.

shard.desc: Primal Split now creates a Void brewling. Has Astral Pulse ability, affecting enemies in 500 AoE. Applies a 20/30/40% slow and Disarm for 2 seconds.

scepter.desc: Primal Split has 2 charges and can be canceled at any time. Charge replenish time is equal to the normal cooldown.

ultimates.name: Warpath
ultimates.desc: Bristleback works himself up into a fury every time he casts a spell, increasing his movement speed and damage.

ultimates.name: Spawn Spiderlings
ultimates.desc: Broodmother injects her young into an enemy unit, dealing damage. The spiderlings will hatch if the target is killed while under this influence.

ultimates.name: Stampede
ultimates.desc: Centaur leads all allies into a vicious charge causing them to move through units at max speed and stop any enemy units they trample. Trampled enemies take damage based on Centaur Warrunner's strength. Each enemy can be trampled once.

scepter.desc: Heroes affected by Stampede take reduced damage, and are able to run through obstructions, including trees and up cliffs. Increases duration by 1 second.

ultimates.name: Phantasm
ultimates.desc:
Summons several phantasmal copies of the Chaos Knight from alternate dimensions. The phantasms are strong illusions that deal 100% damage, but take 325% damage.
DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

scepter.desc: Creates an illusion of allied heroes. Creates an additional illusion for Chaos Knight as well.

ultimates.name: Hand of God
ultimates.desc: Heals all allied heroes on the map as well as all units under Chen's control.

ultimates.name: Death Pact
ultimates.desc: Clinkz consumes the target enemy unit or friendly unit, gaining max health and damage based on its current health.

ultimates.name: Hookshot
ultimates.desc: Fires a grappling device rapidly at the target location.  If the hook hits a unit, Clockwerk launches himself into the target, stunning and dealing damage.  Any enemies Clockwerk collides with along the way are damaged and stunned.

ultimates.name: Freezing Field
ultimates.desc: CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage. Grants bonus armor while channeling. Lasts 10 seconds.

shard.desc: Allows you to move, cast and attack during Freezing Field. Can still be interrupted by enemies. You move 75% slower during this.

scepter.desc: Applies Frostbite to any unit that has been standing in the Freezing Field for over a set amount of time.

ultimates.name: Wall of Replica
ultimates.desc: Raises a wall of warping light that slows and creates replicas of any enemy hero who crosses it. Enemy replicas serve at the Dark Seer's will. Replicas last until they are destroyed, or until the wall's duration ends.

ultimates.name: Terrorize
ultimates.desc: Dark Willow releases her pet wisp to terrorize her enemies. After a short delay, all enemies in the target area become fearful and run toward their home fountain. Terrorize cannot be used while Bedlam is active.

ultimates.name: Solar Guardian
ultimates.desc: Dawnbreaker creates a pulsing effect at a location within 350 units of an allied hero anywhere on the map, damaging enemies and healing allies with each pulse. After a short duration, she flies to the target location, dealing additional damage and stunning enemies upon landing. Once channeled, Dawnbreaker cannot stop the ability.

ultimates.name: Bad Juju
ultimates.desc: Passively reduces cooldowns on Dazzle's abilities and items. Anytime he casts a spell, all nearby enemies will have their armor reduced. Debuff stacks and refreshes duration.

shard.desc: Causes Dazzle to launch an attack at the three closest enemies within 1200 range each time he casts an ability.

ultimates.name: Exorcism
ultimates.desc: Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt. Lasts 35 seconds.

scepter.desc: Whenever an enemy is affected by Death Prophet's spells or when she attacks an enemy, a ghost will fly out, slow and hit the enemy for bonus its usual damage then return to her with life.

ultimates.name: Static Storm
ultimates.desc: Creates a damaging static storm that also silences all enemy units in the area for the duration.  The damage starts off weak, but increases in power over the duration.

scepter.desc: Mutes items.

ultimates.name: Doom
ultimates.desc:
Inflicts a curse that dispels an enemy Hero and prevents an them from casting spells or using items, while taking damage over time.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

scepter.desc: Doom applies Break and increases duration by 6 seconds.

ultimates.name: Elder Dragon Form
ultimates.desc:
Dragon Knight takes the form of one of three powerful elder dragons, increasing his speed, and Dragon Tail's range, while granting him new powers.
LEVEL 1 Green Dragon - Corrosive Breath: attacks deal 20 poison damage per second for 5 seconds. Works on structures.
LEVEL 2 Red Dragon - Splash Attack: attacks damage all enemy units in a 350 radius for 75% damage, with Corrosive Breath added to the targets.
LEVEL 3 Blue Dragon - Frost Breath: slows movement speed by -40% and attack speed by -40 of enemy units in Splash Attack range for 3 seconds, with Corrosive Breath added to the targets.

shard.desc: Grants Elder Dragon Form the Fireball ability.

scepter.desc: Increases the level of Dragon Knight's ultimate. Adds a 4th level, Black Dragon. Black Dragon has bonus Corrosive Damage, Splash Damage and Slow amount, increased Magic Resistance and free pathing.

ultimates.name: Marksmanship
ultimates.desc: Drow's experiences in battle grant her a chance to launch arrows with incredible accuracy and effectiveness. Pierces through the enemy's defenses, ignoring their base armor. Grants Drow and nearby ranged heroes with bonus agility based on Drow's current agility. This ability is disabled if there is an enemy hero within 400 range.

scepter.desc: Causes Drow Ranger's attacks to splinter on the target, hitting nearby units with normal attacks that deal reduced damage.

ultimates.name: Magnetize
ultimates.desc: Magnetizes units in a small nearby area, causing them to take damage for a short duration. Magnetized heroes cause nearby Stone Remnants to explode, destroying the remnant and refreshing Magnetize's duration on all nearby enemies. This process can repeat multiple times. If an enemy hero is affected by Geomagnetic Grip or Boulder Smash, all magnetized heroes share the effects.

shard.desc: Causes Stone Remnant to provide 375 ground vision. Increases charge count by 4.

ultimates.name: Echo Slam
ultimates.desc: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units.  Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units. Real heroes cause two echoes.

ultimates.name: Earth Splitter
ultimates.desc: Sends forth a jagged crack in front of Elder Titan. After 3 seconds, the crack implodes, slowing movement while dealing damage to each enemy based on their maximum life. Half of the damage dealt is Magical damage, while the other half is Physical damage.

ultimates.name: Fire Remnant
ultimates.desc: Ember Spirit generates Fire Remnant charges every 38 seconds, with a max of 3 charges. Releasing a charge sends a Fire Remnant that runs to the target location at 250% Ember Spirit's speed.  Using Activate Fire Remnant, Ember Spirit can dash out to his Remnants, dealing damage along the way and exploding them upon arrival.  The targeted Remnant will be arrived at last.

shard.desc: Fire Remnants deal 45 damage per second in a 600 AoE around them. If an enemy hero dies within 400 range of Ember Spirit, a Fire Remnant charge will be replenished.

scepter.desc: Increases cast range, initial remnant speed, and maximum charges. Activate Fire Remnant costs less mana.

ultimates.name: Untouchable
ultimates.desc: Enchantress beguiles her enemies, slowing their attacks when she is attacked.

ultimates.name: Black Hole
ultimates.desc: CHANNELED - Summons a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units.  Enemies affected by Black Hole cannot move, attack, or cast spells.

shard.desc: Black Hole does a non-interrupting pull towards it in a 1200 AoE. Pulls at a rate of 175.

scepter.desc: Adds the current level of Midnight Pulse to Black Hole.

ultimates.name: Chronosphere
ultimates.desc: Creates a blister in spacetime, trapping all units caught in its sphere of influence and causes you to move very quickly inside it.  Only Faceless Void and any units he controls are unaffected.  Invisible enemies in the sphere will be revealed.

ultimates.name: Soulbind
ultimates.desc: Binds a targeted enemy hero to its nearest allied hero within the bind radius, preventing both from moving away from each other. Any unit-targeted ability that either bound hero receives also gets cast on the other hero. If the bind is broken before the duration expires, the initial target will be bound to its nearest allied hero in the radius.

ultimates.name: Call Down
ultimates.desc: Call down an aerial missile strike on enemy units in a target area. After 2 seconds, two missiles arrive in succession, with 2 seconds between them.

ultimates.name: Sharpshooter
ultimates.desc:
Hoodwink charges up and fires a deadly bolt from her crossbow, dealing heavy damage and slow to an enemy Hero.  The damage and debuff duration scale up to max after 3 seconds, and the bolt is fired automatically after 5 seconds.
Hoodwink is knocked backwards for a distance of 350 from the force of the shot.

ultimates.name: Life Break
ultimates.desc:
Huskar draws upon his health to break an enemy's life, leaping at a target within attack range to shatter a percentage of that hero's current health, and slowing them.  While leaping, Huskar is Spell Immune.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

scepter.desc: Forces the enemy target to attack Huskar and increases cast range.

ultimates.name: Relocate
ultimates.desc: Teleports Io and any tethered ally to any location. After the spell expires Io and any tethered ally will return to their original location. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.

ultimates.name: Macropyre
ultimates.desc: Jakiro exhales a wide line of lasting flames, which deals damage per second to any enemy units caught in the fire.

scepter.desc: Increases Macropyre distance by +400 range, duration by +20 seconds and causes it to become Pure damage and pierce Spell Immunity.

ultimates.name: Omnislash
ultimates.desc: Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy units, and then slashes the target and other nearby enemy units at an increased attack rate. Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.

ultimates.name: Spirit Form
ultimates.desc: Ezalor temporarily turns his body luminescent, gaining bonus movement speed, cast range, grants the Blinding Light ability, and allows Illuminate to be channeled by a separate spirit and heal allies during the day.

ultimates.name: Ghostship
ultimates.desc: Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage. Allied heroes touched by the Ghostship are given a swig of The Admiral's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to incoming damage.

ultimates.name: Duel
ultimates.desc: Legion Commander and the target enemy hero are forced to attack each other for a short duration.  Neither hero can use items or abilities.  If either hero dies during the duration, the hero winning the Duel gains permanent bonus damage.

shard.desc: While Dueling, immediately and every 2 seconds, an Overwhelming Odds is cast centered on a random enemy unit within 900 radius. Does not center on the same target twice. Prioritizes heroes.

scepter.desc: Increases Duel duration, and makes Legion Commander and her opponent only take 50% damage from other sources. Reduces cooldown by 20 seconds.

ultimates.name: Pulse Nova
ultimates.desc: Creates waves of damaging energy around Leshrac, one per second, to damage nearby enemy units. Drains Leshrac's mana with each pulse.

ultimates.name: Chain Frost
ultimates.desc: Releases an orb of frost that bounces between nearby enemy units up to 10 times, slowing and damaging each time it hits. Each bounce increases the damage for the subsequent bounces.

ultimates.name: Infest
ultimates.desc:
Lifestealer infests the body of a target unit, becoming undetectable, and healing for a portion of his max hitpoints every second while inside. He can then explode from the host body, dealing damage to nearby enemies. If the infested unit is an enemy creep or a neutral creep, he can take control of the unit's ability to move and attack. Does not work on enemy heroes.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

scepter.desc: Allows Infesting enemy heroes for 5 seconds, attacking their insides once every 1.25 seconds and doubling Lifestealer's regen rate. Increases cast range to 500 and reduces cooldown to 20 seconds.

ultimates.name: Laguna Blade
ultimates.desc: Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.

shard.desc: Increases Laguna Blade's cast range by 250 and causes it to go the full cast length and hit all units along the way. Can be ground targeted.

scepter.desc: Changes Laguna Blade's damage type to Pure, and allows it to slice through spell immunity.

ultimates.name: Finger of Death
ultimates.desc: Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage and grows stronger with each life it consumes.

scepter.desc: Increases damage. Decreases cooldown. Finger of Death hits all units in a small area.

ultimates.name: True Form
ultimates.desc: Lone Druid learns to morph himself into a raging bear, losing his ranged advantage, but gaining increased resistance, Entangling Roots and Demolish.

ultimates.name: Eclipse
ultimates.desc: Showers random nearby enemies with strikes from Luna's current level of Lucent Beam. These beams do not stun their targets, and there is a maximum number of times that a single target can be struck. Also turns day into night for 10 seconds.

scepter.desc: Allows Luna to cast Eclipse on an allied unit or herself and have its effects follow them, or cast it on an area. Also increases total beams and duration, removes the limit on beams per unit, and makes the beams appear twice as fast.

ultimates.name: Shapeshift
ultimates.desc: Lycan assumes his lupine form, granting him and his units critical strikes and added vision at night. During Shapeshift, Lycan and all units under his control move at increased speed, cannot be slowed and have a 40% chance to deal a critical strike doing 150% damage.

ultimates.name: Reverse Polarity
ultimates.desc: Magnus changes properties of matter, sucking all nearby enemies in front of him and stunning them with a powerful slam and dealing damage.

ultimates.name: Arena Of Blood
ultimates.desc: After a short formation time, Mars summons an arena lined with the undead warriors of the Ash Legion, who block enemy attacks and movement. Enemy heroes near the inside edge of the arena will be attacked by spears, dealing damage and knocking them back.

ultimates.name: Stone Gaze
ultimates.desc: Any enemy units looking at Medusa will have their movement and attack speed slowed.  If 2 seconds of total time is accumulated looking at Medusa while Stone Gaze is active, that unit will turn to stone.  Petrified units are stunned, and take bonus physical damage.

ultimates.name: Moonlight Shadow
ultimates.desc: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible and grants bonus movement speed. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow's duration has not expired.

ultimates.name: Wukong's Command
ultimates.desc: Monkey King creates a circular formation of soldiers that spread out from his position. If Monkey King leaves the area his soldiers disperse. The soldiers have Monkey King's attack and only target heroes. Monkey King is granted bonus armor for the spell's duration.

scepter.desc: Spawns a monkey soldier near Monkey King at regular intervals. Soldiers do not spawn while invisible or on trees. Soldiers only attack buildings when Monkey King himself is nearby.

ultimates.name: Song of the Siren
ultimates.desc: All enemies in range of the Naga Siren are put into a magical stasis where they cannot act or be attacked. Using Song of the Siren again will end the duration early.

ultimates.name: Wrath of Nature
ultimates.desc: Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies close to the cast point that are in vision. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage. Enemies that die under this spell grant you bonus damage for 50 seconds.

scepter.desc: Lowers cooldown from 85 to 60. Entangles all enemies it hits. Duration scales from 2 up to 3.8 seconds at max bounce.

ultimates.name: Reaper's Scythe
ultimates.desc: Stuns the target enemy hero, then deals damage based on how much life it is missing. Heroes killed by Reaper's Scythe will have 15 seconds added to their respawn timer. Any kill under this effect is credited to Necrophos.

ultimates.name: Dark Ascension
ultimates.desc: Night Stalker smothers the sun and summons instant darkness, so that he might use his powers at their fullest. Nightstalker gains flight and bonus damage during this time. Has unobstructed vision.

ultimates.name: Vendetta
ultimates.desc: Allows Nyx Assassin to become invisible and gain a speed bonus.  If Nyx Assassin attacks to break the invisibility, massive bonus damage is dealt with the attack.

shard.desc: Causes Nyx's Vendetta attack to reduce enemy magic resistance by 20% for 4 seconds. Also increases Vendetta movement speed by 25%.

ultimates.name: Guardian Angel
ultimates.desc: Omniknight calls upon a Guardian Angel that grants allies immunity from physical damage.

scepter.desc: Increases duration, provides HP regen, radius becomes global and affects buildings.

ultimates.name: False Promise
ultimates.desc:
Temporarily alters an ally's destiny, delaying any healing or damage taken until False Promise ends. Any healing that is delayed by False Promise is doubled. Removes most negative status effects and disables on initial cast.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

shard.desc: Causes False Promise to have a 0.15-second fade delay invisibility.

ultimates.name: Sanity's Eclipse
ultimates.desc: Unleashes a psychic blast that deals to enemies based on the difference between your mana and the target's mana. Sanity's Eclipse can hit units trapped by Astral Imprisonment.

ultimates.name: Rolling Thunder
ultimates.desc:
Pangolier curls into a spell-immune ball and rolls out. When rolling, he moves at an increased speed and can move through trees, but has a decreased ability to turn. Striking enemies knocks them back, inflicting damage and stunning them when they land. 

Colliding with walls or cliffs will cause a temporary pause while Pangolier reverses in direction.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

ultimates.name: Coup de Grace
ultimates.desc: Phantom Assassin refines her combat abilities, gaining a chance of delivering a devastating critical strike to enemy units. Stifling Dagger shares the same critical strike chance.

ultimates.name: Juxtapose
ultimates.desc: Phantom Lancer has a chance to fracture his presence, creating an illusion of himself. Illusions also have a chance to fracture further. Illusions created from Phantom Lancer last for 8 seconds, while illusions created from other illusions last 4 seconds.

scepter.desc: Adds Juxtapose active ability. Destroys Phantom Lancer's other juxtapose illusions and quickly creates the max illusions it allows with a bonus 10 seconds of duration.

ultimates.name: Supernova
ultimates.desc:
The Phoenix willingly ends its current life for the chance to be reborn. Transforms into a burning sun that scorches enemies in a huge area. The sun can be destroyed by attacks from enemy Heroes. After 6 seconds the sun explodes, stunning all nearby enemies while restoring Phoenix to full health and mana with refreshed abilities.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

scepter.desc: Increases number of attacks to destroy Supernova and allows Phoenix to cast Supernova on an allied hero, bringing both into the sun to be reborn together.

ultimates.name: Dream Coil
ultimates.desc: Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, stunning them for 0.5 seconds, damaging and leashing them.  If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, stunning and dealing additional damage.

scepter.desc: Increases damage from coil breaks, increases coil duration, coil break stun goes through spell immunity.

ultimates.name: Dismember
ultimates.desc: CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Pudge gets healed for the same amount he damages. Lasts longer on creeps.

shard.desc: Allows targeting an ally to swallow them and heal them for 6% of their max health per second. Reduces cooldown by 10 seconds.

ultimates.name: Life Drain
ultimates.desc:
CHANNELED - When cast on an enemy, Pugna drains health from the target enemy unit to heal himself and granting vision over the target. If Pugna has full HP, and the enemy target is a Hero, Life Drain will restore mana instead.

When cast on an ally, Pugna will drain his own health into his ally.

shard.desc: For every 1.5 seconds of channel, another secondary Life Drain is created targeting another random enemy hero.

scepter.desc: Removes cooldown and increases damage.

ultimates.name: Sonic Wave
ultimates.desc: Creates a gigantic wave of sound in front of Queen of Pain, dealing heavy damage to all enemy units in its wake and pushing them back.

scepter.desc: Increases damage and decreases cooldown.

ultimates.name: Eye of the Storm
ultimates.desc: A powerful lightning storm strikes out at enemy units with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing their armor.

scepter.desc: Causes Eye of the Storm to strike two different units instead of one and can damage structures. When striking buildings, it will only target towers, barracks, and the Ancient.

ultimates.name: Cloak and Dagger
ultimates.desc: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible. Every time Riki strikes his enemy from behind, he deals bonus damage based on his Agility. When Riki attacks, he becomes visible.

ultimates.name: Epicenter
ultimates.desc: CHANNELED - After channeling for 2 seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.

shard.desc: Every 700 units moved causes an Epicenter Pulse around Sand King in 475 AoE.

ultimates.name: Demonic Purge
ultimates.desc:
Purges the target enemy unit, removing positive buffs, and slowing the target for the duration.  The unit slowly regains its speed until the end of the duration, upon which damage is dealt.  Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Demonic Purge.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

shard.desc: Allows Demonic Purge to be cast on allies, continuously dispelling them and healing for its damage values. Does not slow allies.

scepter.desc: Cooldown is removed, replaced with 3 charges that replenish every 60 seconds. Also causes Demonic Purge to break its target's passive abilities while active.

ultimates.name: Requiem of Souls
ultimates.desc: Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will be feared and have its movement speed reduced for 0.80000001192093 seconds for each line hit. Lines of energy are created for every soul captured through Necromastery.  Requiem of Souls is automatically cast whenever Shadow Fiend dies, regardless of its cooldown.

scepter.desc: Increases Necromastery Max Souls and causes Requiem of Souls to return back to Shadow Fiend. The wave back to Shadow Fiend deals less damage, but heals Shadow Fiend for all the damage it dealt.

ultimates.name: Mass Serpent Ward
ultimates.desc: Summons 10 Serpent Wards to attack enemy units and structures. The Wards are immune to magic.

scepter.desc: Causes Serpent Wards to have split shot, attacking two units for full damage. Increases attack range of Serpent Wards.

ultimates.name: Global Silence
ultimates.desc: Silencer stops all sound, preventing enemy heroes and units on the map from casting spells.

ultimates.name: Mystic Flare
ultimates.desc: Skywrath Mage uses his ultimate magical ability to conjure a precise and violent mystical field that lays waste to his adversaries. Deals massive damage distributed evenly among any Heroes in the area over 2.4000000953674 seconds.

shard.desc: Causes Mystic Flare to not split its damage and affect creeps as well.

scepter.desc: When Skywrath Mage casts Mystic Flare, another Mystic Flare will be created on the position of a different random target enemy within 700 range. Heroes will take priority

ultimates.name: Corrosive Haze
ultimates.desc: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight and vision of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility.

ultimates.name: Shadow Dance
ultimates.desc: When used, Slark hides himself in a cloud of shadows, becoming immune to detection. Attacking, casting spells, and using items will not reveal Slark.  Passively, when not visible to the enemy team, Slark gains bonus movement speed and health regeneration.

ultimates.name: Mortimer Kisses
ultimates.desc: Snapfire's friend launches a barrage of firespit globs over 6 seconds. Globs cause impact damage and create pools of firespit, which slow and apply damage over time. Snapfire has a reduced turn rate for the duration and a minimum launch range of 600. Each glob can be targeted with a right click.

ultimates.name: Assassinate
ultimates.desc: Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit and, after a short aiming duration, fires a devastating shot that deals damage at long range and mini-stuns the target.

scepter.desc: Causes Assassinate to fire quicker and disable the enemy target.

ultimates.name: Haunt
ultimates.desc:
Creates a spectral nemesis to attack each enemy hero. At any moment during the duration, Spectre can use Reality to exchange places of a given haunt.

Haunt illusions are uncontrollable, take extra damage, and deal less damage than Spectre herself.  They ignore terrain.

ultimates.name: Nether Strike
ultimates.desc: Spirit Breaker slips into the nether realm, reappearing next to his hapless victim. Upon reappearing, a Greater Bash of the current level occurs and deals bonus damage. Knocks back for double the normal distance.

shard.desc: Causes Nether Strike to deal 200 extra damage, and apply a 4-second break. Grants you Spell Immunity for 2 seconds.

ultimates.name: Ball Lightning
ultimates.desc: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The activation mana cost is 30+8% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is 10+0.64999997615814% of his total mana pool.  Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.

ultimates.name: God's Strength
ultimates.desc: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage for 40 seconds.

ultimates.name: Remote Mines
ultimates.desc: Plant an invisible explosive that will only detonate after a brief delay when triggered.  Does not damage buildings.

scepter.desc: Increases damage and cast range. Allows Minefield Sign to hide any Proximity Mines, Stasis Traps, and Remote Mines in an area around the sign from True Sight.

ultimates.name: Psionic Trap
ultimates.desc: Templar Assassin places mystical traps that invisibly monitor enemy movement. When sprung at her command, they exert a slowing influence of 30% in the area. Traps charge up to slow 60% after 4 seconds. Deals bonus damage when fully charged.

shard.desc: Causes Psionic Traps to silence enemies for up to 3.5 seconds based on how long the trap has been charged. Increases max trap count by 4 and vision by 125.

ultimates.name: Sunder
ultimates.desc: Severs the life from both Terrorblade and a target hero, exchanging a percentage of both units' current health. Some health points must remain.

ultimates.name: Ravage
ultimates.desc: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.

ultimates.name: Chakram
ultimates.desc: Fires Timbersaw's main saw blade at the target location where it will spin in place, dealing damage in an area around it.  Enemies caught in the saw blade will move more slowly for every 5% of health missing. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted.  While active the ability costs mana, and Timbersaw loses the ability to attack.

ultimates.name: Rearm
ultimates.desc: CHANNELED - Resets the cooldown on most of Tinker's items and abilities.

ultimates.name: Grow
ultimates.desc: Tiny gains craggy mass, increasing his attack damage, and armor, while slowing his attack speed.

ultimates.name: Overgrowth
ultimates.desc: Summons an overgrowth of vines and branches around Treant that deal damage to afflicted enemies and prevent them from moving, blinking, going invisible, or attacking.

ultimates.name: Battle Trance
ultimates.desc: Troll unleashes a powerful battle trance, that forces you to continuously attack the closest enemy unit within 900 range, prioritizing heroes. Damage does not kill you during this mode. Grants you bonus lifesteal, attack speed and movement speed. Applies a Basic Dispel.

shard.desc: Casting Battle Trance now gives Troll Warlord a global aura that gives allied heroes (including himself) +60 Attack Speed.

ultimates.name: Walrus PUNCH!
ultimates.desc: Tusk connects with his mighty Walrus Punch, a critical strike so powerful it launches its victim into the air. The victim is slowed upon landing.

ultimates.name: Dark Rift
ultimates.desc: Opens a dark rift at the targeted friendly unit's or building's position.  After a short delay, Underlord and all nearby friendly heroes are teleported to that unit's location.  Dark Rift can be cancelled at anytime during the cast.  If it is cancelled in this way or the target unit dies before the spell becomes active, Dark Rift goes into cooldown.

scepter.desc: Dark Rift has two charges and can be cast on allied heroes. Reduces cast delay by 1 second.

ultimates.name: Flesh Golem
ultimates.desc: Undying transforms into a horrifying flesh golem. Gains a percentage increase to strength and imbues attacks with a slow and damage amplification.

ultimates.name: Enrage
ultimates.desc:
Ursa goes into a frenzy, providing damage reduction and status resistance. Removes any existing debuffs.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

scepter.desc: Reduces cooldown and allows Ursa to use Enrage while disabled.

ultimates.name: Nether Swap
ultimates.desc: Instantaneously swaps positions with a target Hero, friend or enemy.  Nether Swap interrupts channeling abilities on the target.

ultimates.name: Poison Nova
ultimates.desc: A spreading ring of poison that does damage over time to enemy units around Venomancer.  Poison Nova cannot deal lethal damage; targets will be left with at least 1 health.

scepter.desc: Increases damage and decreases cooldown.

ultimates.name: Viper Strike
ultimates.desc: Viper slows the targeted enemy unit's movement and attack speed while also dealing poison damage over time.  The slowing effect reduces over the duration of the poison.

scepter.desc: Decreases mana cost and cooldown. Increases cast range.

ultimates.name: Summon Familiars
ultimates.desc: Conjures two blind Familiars to fight for Visage.  Familiars possess the Stone Form ability, that allows them to turn into stone, stunning enemies upon landing.  While in Stone Form, Familiars are invulnerable, and rapidly regenerate their health.  Familiars grant high bounty when killed.

ultimates.name: Astral Step
ultimates.desc: Void Spirit tears a rift through the astral plane to appear at the target location, attacking all enemies along the path. This attack inflicts a void mark that slows for 1.25 seconds and then detonates.

ultimates.name: Chaotic Offering
ultimates.desc: Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for one second. The Golem lives 60 seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack.

scepter.desc: Calls 2 Golems with reduced stats and bounty.

ultimates.name: Time Lapse
ultimates.desc:
Weaver warps backward to whatever position it was in five seconds earlier--regaining the HP and mana from that time. No effect on cooldown, gold or experience.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

scepter.desc: Reduces cooldown, and allows Weaver to cast Time Lapse on an ally.

ultimates.name: Focus Fire
ultimates.desc: Windranger channels the wind to gain 475 additional attack speed against a single enemy unit or structure, though with a reduction to her attack damage.  Extra damage from secondary item effects is not reduced.

ultimates.name: Winter's Curse
ultimates.desc: Winter Wyvern freezes an enemy in place while striking those nearby with a maddening curse which causes them to attack their frozen ally with increased attack speed. The frozen ally and those cursed to attack their ally are immune to all damage from their enemies with the exception of Winter Wyvern or her controlled units.

ultimates.name: Death Ward
ultimates.desc: CHANNELED - Summons a deadly ward to attack enemy heroes within it's attack range. Lasts a maximum of 8 seconds.

scepter.desc: Death Ward attacks have True Strike and bounce between nearby enemies.

ultimates.name: Reincarnation
ultimates.desc: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle.  Upon death, enemy units in a 900 radius will be slowed.

shard.desc: Causes Reincarnation to have no mana cost and spawn three skeletons to attack each nearby enemy hero when Reincarnation is triggered.

scepter.desc: If a nearby allied hero is slain, they will be transformed into a wraith and have their death delayed for 7 seconds. Buffs the transformed units with +70 attack speed and +25% movement speed.

ultimates.name: Thundergod's Wrath
ultimates.desc: Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, no matter where they may be.  Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck.  If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.

upgrades.name: Borrowed Time
upgrades.desc:
When activated, all damage dealt to you will heal instead of harm. Most negative buffs will also be removed. If the ability is not on cooldown, it will automatically activate if your health falls below 400.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

scepter.desc: Increases duration. While Borrowed Time is active, anytime an ally takes more than 525 damage while within 1600 range of Abaddon, an individual Mist Coil will automatically fire towards that ally.

upgrades.name: Greevil's Greed
upgrades.desc: Alchemist synthesizes additional gold from his enemies and bounty runes. With each kill, Alchemist earns base bonus gold and extra bonus gold. If Alchemist kills another unit which yields gold within the next 36 seconds, an additional instance of Extra Bonus Gold is added to the total. Additionally, causes bounty runes to yield more gold.

scepter.desc: Alchemist melts down Aghanim's Scepter to grant an allied hero all Aghanim's Scepter upgrades. When you have a Scepter of your own, you will gain bonus damage and spell amplification for each gifted Scepter.

upgrades.name: Chilling Touch
upgrades.desc: Enhances Ancient Apparition's attack with increased range, heavy magic damage, and movement slow.

scepter.desc: Removes cooldown and reduces manacost by half.

upgrades.name: Spark Wraith
upgrades.desc: Summons a Spark Wraith that slowly materializes and patrols a targeted area until an enemy comes within its range. Once a target has been found the wraith fuses with them, dealing magical damage and slowing the unit.

scepter.desc: Causes Spark Wraiths to spawn a new Spark Wraith after impacting an enemy, which then starts its 3 second activation period.

upgrades.name: Berserker's Call
upgrades.desc: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.

scepter.desc:
Berserker's Call applies Battle Hunger to affected units. Battle Hunger also reduces enemy armor by 7 and grants Axe 7 armor per affected target. 

Reduces Berserker's Call cooldown by 3.

upgrades.name: Battle Hunger
upgrades.desc: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to be slowed and take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. Axe gains movement speed for each unit affected with Battle Hunger, half speed from creeps.

scepter.desc: Battle Hunger also reduces enemy armor by 7 and grants Axe 7 armor per affected targeted.

upgrades.name: Fiend's Grip
upgrades.desc: CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every 0.5 seconds based on the unit's maximum mana.

scepter.desc: Reduces Fiend's Grip cooldown by 45 seconds. Fiend's Grip now creates two uncontrollable illusions that are also channeling Fiend's Grip on the target. Illusions takes 700% incoming damage and immediately dies if they are interrupted. Damage does not stack.

upgrades.name: Flaming Lasso
upgrades.desc: Lassoes an enemy and drags them in Batrider's wake.  Victims cannot be dragged over impassable terrain. Dragged units cannot move, attack, or use abilities.  Teleporting or blinking will break the lasso.

shard.desc: Allows Flaming Lasso to be cast on an allied hero, granting them 80% damage reduction. Has 20 second cooldown when used on allies.

scepter.desc: Flaming Lasso grabs both its target, as well as the target's nearest allied hero within range. The secondary target is tethered to the first.

upgrades.name: Wild Axes
upgrades.desc: Beastmaster sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path.  Each axe can hit an enemy once, and amplifies subsequent damage from Beastmaster and his units.

scepter.desc: Causes Wild Axes to have no cooldown and can be used again once they come back.

upgrades.name: Rupture
upgrades.desc: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture, dealing initial damage based on its current health. If the unit moves, it takes damage based on the distance moved.  The damage is dealt through spell immunity.

scepter.desc: Grants Bloodseeker two charges of Rupture

upgrades.name: Shuriken Toss
upgrades.desc: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and mini-stunning the target.  The shuriken will bounce to any Tracked units who are within a 1200 radius of each other.

scepter.desc: Upgrades Shuriken Toss. Applies Jinada to it, reduces cooldown and increases cast range.

upgrades.name: Primal Split
upgrades.desc: Splits Brewmaster into elements, forming 3 specialized warriors, adept at survival, each with their own abilities. If any of them survive until the end of their summoned timer, the Brewmaster is reborn.

shard.desc: Primal Split now creates a Void brewling. Has Astral Pulse ability, affecting enemies in 500 AoE. Applies a 20/30/40% slow and Disarm for 2 seconds.

scepter.desc: Primal Split has 2 charges and can be canceled at any time. Charge replenish time is equal to the normal cooldown.

upgrades.name: Viscous Nasal Goo
upgrades.desc: Covers a target in snot, causing it to have reduced armor and movement speed.  Multiple casts stack and refresh the duration.

scepter.desc: Viscous Nasal Goo becomes a no target area of effect ability, applying to all enemies within range. Increases Stack Limit to 8.

upgrades.name: Spin Web
upgrades.desc: Spins a large web that grants Broodmother a passive movement speed increase, gives free movement, and boosts regeneration while in its vicinity. Spin Web charges restore every 40 seconds. Spin Web can be cast from anywhere as long as the new web touches an existing web. Webs never expire, and can be manually destroyed. When the maximum limit of webs is exceeded, the oldest web disappears.

scepter.desc: Increases movement speed, and increases Spin Web max count

upgrades.name: Stampede
upgrades.desc: Centaur leads all allies into a vicious charge causing them to move through units at max speed and stop any enemy units they trample. Trampled enemies take damage based on Centaur Warrunner's strength. Each enemy can be trampled once.

scepter.desc: Heroes affected by Stampede take reduced damage, and are able to run through obstructions, including trees and up cliffs. Increases duration by 1 second.

upgrades.name: Phantasm
upgrades.desc:
Summons several phantasmal copies of the Chaos Knight from alternate dimensions. The phantasms are strong illusions that deal 100% damage, but take 325% damage.
DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

scepter.desc: Creates an illusion of allied heroes. Creates an additional illusion for Chaos Knight as well.

upgrades.name: Holy Persuasion
upgrades.desc:
Chen takes control of an enemy or neutral creep. If the persuaded creep's base health is naturally below the health minimum, its base health will be raised to the health minimum. Converted creeps will have increased movement speed and bonus damage. 

Can be cast on converted creeps to teleport them to Chen. If cast on Chen, all units controlled by Chen will be teleported to him. Taking damage will dispel the buff.

scepter.desc: Allows Holy Persuasion to target Ancient Creeps.

upgrades.name: Freezing Field
upgrades.desc: CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage. Grants bonus armor while channeling. Lasts 10 seconds.

shard.desc: Allows you to move, cast and attack during Freezing Field. Can still be interrupted by enemies. You move 75% slower during this.

scepter.desc: Applies Frostbite to any unit that has been standing in the Freezing Field for over a set amount of time.

upgrades.name: Ion Shell
upgrades.desc: Surrounds the target unit with a bristling shield that damages enemy units in an area around it.

scepter.desc: Causes Ion Shell to have 2 Charges, increases duration by 20 seconds and provides +300 Health.

upgrades.name: Shadow Realm
upgrades.desc: Dark Willow recedes into the shadows, becoming untargetable.  Her next attack has increased attack range and deals bonus magic damage, and will end Shadow Realm. Damage scales based on how long she remains under the effects of Shadow Realm, the maximum being reached after 3.5 seconds.

scepter.desc: Attacking no longer takes Dark Willow out of Shadow Realm. Each attack still has bonus damage based on the duration of the buff.

upgrades.name: Shadow Wave
upgrades.desc: Sends out a bolt of power that arcs between allies, healing them while damaging any units standing nearby.  Dazzle is always healed by Shadow Wave.

scepter.desc: Causes Shadow Wave to dispel allies. Increases heal by +100 and damage by +100.

upgrades.name: Exorcism
upgrades.desc: Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt. Lasts 35 seconds.

scepter.desc: Whenever an enemy is affected by Death Prophet's spells or when she attacks an enemy, a ghost will fly out, slow and hit the enemy for bonus its usual damage then return to her with life.

upgrades.name: Static Storm
upgrades.desc: Creates a damaging static storm that also silences all enemy units in the area for the duration.  The damage starts off weak, but increases in power over the duration.

scepter.desc: Mutes items.

upgrades.name: Doom
upgrades.desc:
Inflicts a curse that dispels an enemy Hero and prevents an them from casting spells or using items, while taking damage over time.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

scepter.desc: Doom applies Break and increases duration by 6 seconds.

upgrades.name: Elder Dragon Form
upgrades.desc:
Dragon Knight takes the form of one of three powerful elder dragons, increasing his speed, and Dragon Tail's range, while granting him new powers.
LEVEL 1 Green Dragon - Corrosive Breath: attacks deal 20 poison damage per second for 5 seconds. Works on structures.
LEVEL 2 Red Dragon - Splash Attack: attacks damage all enemy units in a 350 radius for 75% damage, with Corrosive Breath added to the targets.
LEVEL 3 Blue Dragon - Frost Breath: slows movement speed by -40% and attack speed by -40 of enemy units in Splash Attack range for 3 seconds, with Corrosive Breath added to the targets.

shard.desc: Grants Elder Dragon Form the Fireball ability.

scepter.desc: Increases the level of Dragon Knight's ultimate. Adds a 4th level, Black Dragon. Black Dragon has bonus Corrosive Damage, Splash Damage and Slow amount, increased Magic Resistance and free pathing.

upgrades.name: Marksmanship
upgrades.desc: Drow's experiences in battle grant her a chance to launch arrows with incredible accuracy and effectiveness. Pierces through the enemy's defenses, ignoring their base armor. Grants Drow and nearby ranged heroes with bonus agility based on Drow's current agility. This ability is disabled if there is an enemy hero within 400 range.

scepter.desc: Causes Drow Ranger's attacks to splinter on the target, hitting nearby units with normal attacks that deal reduced damage.

upgrades.name: Enchant Totem
upgrades.desc: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage and have 75 bonus attack range on the next attack.

scepter.desc: Enchant Totem becomes a 950 range ground target ability, causing Earthshaker to jump in the air and land at the target spot, casting Enchant Totem there.  Self-casting the ability will behave in the original form, without jumping. Grants Enchant Totem a 40% cleave hit.

upgrades.name: Astral Spirit
upgrades.desc:
Elder Titan sends forth his Astral Spirit, damaging any units it passes through.  When the spirit rejoins the Titan, it grants bonus damage and movement speed for each unit it passed through.

The Astral Spirit can be controlled and possesses the Echo Stomp, Return Spirit, and Natural Order abilities.

scepter.desc: Causes you to become Spell Immune for 2 seconds per affected enemy hero when the spirit returns to you.

upgrades.name: Fire Remnant
upgrades.desc: Ember Spirit generates Fire Remnant charges every 38 seconds, with a max of 3 charges. Releasing a charge sends a Fire Remnant that runs to the target location at 250% Ember Spirit's speed.  Using Activate Fire Remnant, Ember Spirit can dash out to his Remnants, dealing damage along the way and exploding them upon arrival.  The targeted Remnant will be arrived at last.

shard.desc: Fire Remnants deal 45 damage per second in a 600 AoE around them. If an enemy hero dies within 400 range of Ember Spirit, a Fire Remnant charge will be replenished.

scepter.desc: Increases cast range, initial remnant speed, and maximum charges. Activate Fire Remnant costs less mana.

upgrades.name: Black Hole
upgrades.desc: CHANNELED - Summons a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units.  Enemies affected by Black Hole cannot move, attack, or cast spells.

shard.desc: Black Hole does a non-interrupting pull towards it in a 1200 AoE. Pulls at a rate of 175.

scepter.desc: Adds the current level of Midnight Pulse to Black Hole.

upgrades.name: Time Walk
upgrades.desc: Rushes to a target location while backtracking any damage taken the last 2 seconds.

shard.desc: Grants Reverse Time Walk and increases Time Walk cast range by 400.

scepter.desc: Applies a Time Lock proc to all units at the landing destination.

upgrades.name: Flak Cannon
upgrades.desc: Gyrocopter's attacks hit all enemy units in an area around it for a limited number of attacks.  Only the main target of attacks will receive attack bonuses such as Critical Strike.  Lasts 10 seconds or until the attacks are used.

scepter.desc: Adds a Side Gunner that at random attacks enemy units near Gyrocopter. Prioritizes furthest unit away within its range.

upgrades.name: Life Break
upgrades.desc:
Huskar draws upon his health to break an enemy's life, leaping at a target within attack range to shatter a percentage of that hero's current health, and slowing them.  While leaping, Huskar is Spell Immune.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

scepter.desc: Forces the enemy target to attack Huskar and increases cast range.

upgrades.name: Spirits
upgrades.desc: Summon five particle spirits that dance in a circle around Io. If a particle collides with an enemy hero, it explodes, damaging all enemy units in an area around it.  Creeps take minor damage from touching a particle spirit, but do not cause them to explode.  When its duration ends, any remaining Spirits explode.

scepter.desc: Spirits now passively spawn around Io constantly every second. Max of 5.

upgrades.name: Macropyre
upgrades.desc: Jakiro exhales a wide line of lasting flames, which deals damage per second to any enemy units caught in the fire.

scepter.desc: Increases Macropyre distance by +400 range, duration by +20 seconds and causes it to become Pure damage and pierce Spell Immunity.

upgrades.name: Duel
upgrades.desc: Legion Commander and the target enemy hero are forced to attack each other for a short duration.  Neither hero can use items or abilities.  If either hero dies during the duration, the hero winning the Duel gains permanent bonus damage.

shard.desc: While Dueling, immediately and every 2 seconds, an Overwhelming Odds is cast centered on a random enemy unit within 900 radius. Does not center on the same target twice. Prioritizes heroes.

scepter.desc: Increases Duel duration, and makes Legion Commander and her opponent only take 50% damage from other sources. Reduces cooldown by 20 seconds.

upgrades.name: Sinister Gaze
upgrades.desc: CHANNELED - Hypnotizes an enemy unit, causing it to move towards a point between the two of you and drains a percentage of its current mana.

scepter.desc: Casts Sinister Gaze in a target area.

upgrades.name: Infest
upgrades.desc:
Lifestealer infests the body of a target unit, becoming undetectable, and healing for a portion of his max hitpoints every second while inside. He can then explode from the host body, dealing damage to nearby enemies. If the infested unit is an enemy creep or a neutral creep, he can take control of the unit's ability to move and attack. Does not work on enemy heroes.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

scepter.desc: Allows Infesting enemy heroes for 5 seconds, attacking their insides once every 1.25 seconds and doubling Lifestealer's regen rate. Increases cast range to 500 and reduces cooldown to 20 seconds.

upgrades.name: Laguna Blade
upgrades.desc: Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.

shard.desc: Increases Laguna Blade's cast range by 250 and causes it to go the full cast length and hit all units along the way. Can be ground targeted.

scepter.desc: Changes Laguna Blade's damage type to Pure, and allows it to slice through spell immunity.

upgrades.name: Finger of Death
upgrades.desc: Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage and grows stronger with each life it consumes.

scepter.desc: Increases damage. Decreases cooldown. Finger of Death hits all units in a small area.

upgrades.name: Summon Spirit Bear
upgrades.desc:
Summons a powerful Spirit Bear companion that can equip items.  If the bear moves 1100 distance away from the Lone Druid, it cannot attack.  Lone Druid suffers 20% of his max health as backlash damage if the Spirit Bear dies. Spirit Bear does not benefit from attributes.
Spirit Bear has the Return, Demolish and Entangling Roots abilities.

scepter.desc: Allows Spirit Bear to attack at any range from Lone Druid, and to survive if Lone Druid dies.

upgrades.name: Eclipse
upgrades.desc: Showers random nearby enemies with strikes from Luna's current level of Lucent Beam. These beams do not stun their targets, and there is a maximum number of times that a single target can be struck. Also turns day into night for 10 seconds.

scepter.desc: Allows Luna to cast Eclipse on an allied unit or herself and have its effects follow them, or cast it on an area. Also increases total beams and duration, removes the limit on beams per unit, and makes the beams appear twice as fast.

upgrades.name: Shockwave
upgrades.desc: Magnus sends out a wave of force, damaging enemy units in a line, pulling them towards him and slowing them for a brief period.

scepter.desc: Magnus releases 3 Shockwaves traveling away from him at 30-degree angles. After reaching their limit, the Shockwaves return to their origin, dealing 75% damage and pulling a second time.

upgrades.name: Bulwark
upgrades.desc: Mars wields his massive shield to block a portion of each physical attack when hit from the front or sides. Can be toggled, removing Mars's ability to attack, and locking the direction he is facing. When active, reduces movement speed and re-directs 70% of the attack projectiles aimed at Mars's allies towards Mars instead.

scepter.desc: Creates invulnerable soldiers around Mars' front while Bulwark is toggled on. Soldiers move alongside Mars, dealing his full damage +75 and applying procs. Attacks slow enemies by 30% for 1 second. An enemy can only be attacked by one soldier at a time.

upgrades.name: Mystic Snake
upgrades.desc: A mystic snake made of energy jumps from target to target dealing damage. After it reaches its last target, it returns to Medusa to replenish her with mana. The snake deals more damage per jump and returns 11% mana based on the targets' total mana.

scepter.desc: Causes Mystic Snake to turn enemies hit into stone. Stone duration increases with each bounce of the Mystic Snake.

upgrades.name: Sacred Arrow
upgrades.desc: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from 0.0099999997764826 to 3.5 seconds, with bonus damage up to 180 added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.

scepter.desc: Causes Sacred Arrow to release a Starstorm on enemies within 500 AoE along the travel path of the primary arrow, releasing a second starfall that deals 50% damage to the impacted unit.

upgrades.name: Wukong's Command
upgrades.desc: Monkey King creates a circular formation of soldiers that spread out from his position. If Monkey King leaves the area his soldiers disperse. The soldiers have Monkey King's attack and only target heroes. Monkey King is granted bonus armor for the spell's duration.

scepter.desc: Spawns a monkey soldier near Monkey King at regular intervals. Soldiers do not spawn while invisible or on trees. Soldiers only attack buildings when Monkey King himself is nearby.

upgrades.name: Ensnare
upgrades.desc: Interrupts the target and traps them in place, preventing movement or blinking.

scepter.desc: Allows Ensnare to target Spell Immune or sleeping units. Reduces the Ensnare cooldown by 6 seconds and increases cast range by 400.

upgrades.name: Wrath of Nature
upgrades.desc: Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies close to the cast point that are in vision. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage. Enemies that die under this spell grant you bonus damage for 50 seconds.

scepter.desc: Lowers cooldown from 85 to 60. Entangles all enemies it hits. Duration scales from 2 up to 3.8 seconds at max bounce.

upgrades.name: Ghost Shroud
upgrades.desc: Necrophos slips into the realm that separates the living from the dead. Unable to attack or be attacked, he emits an aura that slows enemies around him. He takes additional magic damage in this form, but his restorative powers are amplified.

scepter.desc: Reduces Ghost Shroud cooldown.

upgrades.name: Heartstopper Aura
upgrades.desc: Necrophos stills the hearts of his opponents, causing nearby enemy units to lose a percentage of their max health over time. Passively provides regen for 8 seconds for each unit Necrophos kills.

scepter.desc: Increases Heartstopper Aura damage while Ghost Shroud is active.

upgrades.name: Void
upgrades.desc: Creates a damaging void that slows an enemy unit and deals damage.  Void also mini-stuns, interrupting channeling abilities. The slowing effect lasts longer at night.

scepter.desc: Causes Void to be an AoE ability. Increases the ministun duration.

upgrades.name: Guardian Angel
upgrades.desc: Omniknight calls upon a Guardian Angel that grants allies immunity from physical damage.

scepter.desc: Increases duration, provides HP regen, radius becomes global and affects buildings.

upgrades.name: Fate's Edict
upgrades.desc: Oracle enraptures a target, disarming them and granting them 100% magic damage resistance. Can be cast on allies and enemies.

scepter.desc: Fate's Edict no longer causes allies to be disarmed or enemies to be immune to magic damage.

upgrades.name: Astral Imprisonment
upgrades.desc: Places a target unit into an astral prison. The hidden unit is invulnerable and disabled. When the astral prison implodes, it deals damage to the target and steals a percentage of their max mana.

scepter.desc: Grants charges to Astral Imprisonment, increases damage by 140 and applies the damage in an area.

upgrades.name: Shield Crash
upgrades.desc:
Pangolier jumps in the air and slams back to the ground in front of his current position, damaging all enemies in a radius. For each enemy hero hit, he gains a percentage of incoming damage reduction for a short time.

Forward movement is maintained if Shield Crash is used while Rolling Thunder is active, and allows Rolling Thunder to clear walls or cliffs.

scepter.desc: Causes Shield Crash to cast a 2-attack Swashbuckle in every 90 degrees around your hero.

upgrades.name: Blur
upgrades.desc:
Phantom Assassin focuses inward, increasing her ability to evade enemy attacks. Can be activated to blur her body, causing her to be impossible to see until near enemy heroes.

Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.

shard.desc: Increases your movement speed by 40% while in Blur's active.

scepter.desc: Causes Blur to have instant cast time and applies a dispel. Anytime Phantom Assassin gets a hero kill, her abilities are refreshed. Reduces Blur cooldown and increases Fade Time to 0.75.

upgrades.name: Juxtapose
upgrades.desc: Phantom Lancer has a chance to fracture his presence, creating an illusion of himself. Illusions also have a chance to fracture further. Illusions created from Phantom Lancer last for 8 seconds, while illusions created from other illusions last 4 seconds.

scepter.desc: Adds Juxtapose active ability. Destroys Phantom Lancer's other juxtapose illusions and quickly creates the max illusions it allows with a bonus 10 seconds of duration.

upgrades.name: Supernova
upgrades.desc:
The Phoenix willingly ends its current life for the chance to be reborn. Transforms into a burning sun that scorches enemies in a huge area. The sun can be destroyed by attacks from enemy Heroes. After 6 seconds the sun explodes, stunning all nearby enemies while restoring Phoenix to full health and mana with refreshed abilities.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

scepter.desc: Increases number of attacks to destroy Supernova and allows Phoenix to cast Supernova on an allied hero, bringing both into the sun to be reborn together.

upgrades.name: Dream Coil
upgrades.desc: Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, stunning them for 0.5 seconds, damaging and leashing them.  If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, stunning and dealing additional damage.

scepter.desc: Increases damage from coil breaks, increases coil duration, coil break stun goes through spell immunity.

upgrades.name: Rot
upgrades.desc: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.

scepter.desc: Increases Rot radius by 225 and damage by 100.Reduces health regen on affected enemies by 25%.

upgrades.name: Life Drain
upgrades.desc:
CHANNELED - When cast on an enemy, Pugna drains health from the target enemy unit to heal himself and granting vision over the target. If Pugna has full HP, and the enemy target is a Hero, Life Drain will restore mana instead.

When cast on an ally, Pugna will drain his own health into his ally.

shard.desc: For every 1.5 seconds of channel, another secondary Life Drain is created targeting another random enemy hero.

scepter.desc: Removes cooldown and increases damage.

upgrades.name: Sonic Wave
upgrades.desc: Creates a gigantic wave of sound in front of Queen of Pain, dealing heavy damage to all enemy units in its wake and pushing them back.

scepter.desc: Increases damage and decreases cooldown.

upgrades.name: Eye of the Storm
upgrades.desc: A powerful lightning storm strikes out at enemy units with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing their armor.

scepter.desc: Causes Eye of the Storm to strike two different units instead of one and can damage structures. When striking buildings, it will only target towers, barracks, and the Ancient.

upgrades.name: Tricks of the Trade
upgrades.desc: Riki phases out of the world while striking random enemy units from behind in an area around him.

scepter.desc: Increases cast range and allows you to target an allied hero, hiding inside them for the duration.

upgrades.name: Burrowstrike
upgrades.desc: Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces.

scepter.desc: Adds Caustic Finale poison to heroes hit by Sand King's Burrowstrike and increases its cast range. Does not apply Caustic Finale to illusions.

upgrades.name: Demonic Purge
upgrades.desc:
Purges the target enemy unit, removing positive buffs, and slowing the target for the duration.  The unit slowly regains its speed until the end of the duration, upon which damage is dealt.  Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Demonic Purge.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

shard.desc: Allows Demonic Purge to be cast on allies, continuously dispelling them and healing for its damage values. Does not slow allies.

scepter.desc: Cooldown is removed, replaced with 3 charges that replenish every 60 seconds. Also causes Demonic Purge to break its target's passive abilities while active.

upgrades.name: Necromastery
upgrades.desc: Shadow Fiend steals the soul from units he kills, gaining bonus damage. On death, he releases 40% of them from bondage.

scepter.desc: Increases Necromastery Max Souls.

upgrades.name: Requiem of Souls
upgrades.desc: Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will be feared and have its movement speed reduced for 0.80000001192093 seconds for each line hit. Lines of energy are created for every soul captured through Necromastery.  Requiem of Souls is automatically cast whenever Shadow Fiend dies, regardless of its cooldown.

scepter.desc: Increases Necromastery Max Souls and causes Requiem of Souls to return back to Shadow Fiend. The wave back to Shadow Fiend deals less damage, but heals Shadow Fiend for all the damage it dealt.

upgrades.name: Mass Serpent Ward
upgrades.desc: Summons 10 Serpent Wards to attack enemy units and structures. The Wards are immune to magic.

scepter.desc: Causes Serpent Wards to have split shot, attacking two units for full damage. Increases attack range of Serpent Wards.

upgrades.name: Last Word
upgrades.desc: Enchants a target, providing vision of them and causing them to be damaged and silenced if they cast a spell or if the enchantment timer expires. Deals extra damage based on the difference in intelligence between Silencer and the target.

scepter.desc: Causes Last Word to become an AoE ability.

upgrades.name: Arcane Bolt
upgrades.desc: Skywrath Mage launches a slow-moving bolt of arcane magic, dealing damage to an enemy unit based on Skywrath Mage's intelligence.

scepter.desc: When Skywrath Mage casts Arcane Bolt, a different random target within 700 range willl be hit with the same ability. Heroes will take priority.

upgrades.name: Concussive Shot
upgrades.desc: Skywrath Mage sets off a long range shot that hits the closest hero within a long range.  Upon impact, it deals damage and slows in an area of effect.

scepter.desc: When Skywrath Mage casts Concussive Shot, a different random target within cast range will be hit with the same ability. Heroes will take priority.

upgrades.name: Ancient Seal
upgrades.desc: Skywrath Mage seals the targeted unit with an ancient rune, silencing it and causing it to take additional damage from spells.

shard.desc: Ancient Seal debuff now causes other debuffs applied to last 50% longer. Grants vision over the target.

scepter.desc: Anytime Skywrath Mage casts Ancient Seal, a different random target within 700 range will be affected by the same ability. Heroes will take priority.

upgrades.name: Mystic Flare
upgrades.desc: Skywrath Mage uses his ultimate magical ability to conjure a precise and violent mystical field that lays waste to his adversaries. Deals massive damage distributed evenly among any Heroes in the area over 2.4000000953674 seconds.

shard.desc: Causes Mystic Flare to not split its damage and affect creeps as well.

scepter.desc: When Skywrath Mage casts Mystic Flare, another Mystic Flare will be created on the position of a different random target enemy within 700 range. Heroes will take priority

upgrades.name: Guardian Sprint
upgrades.desc: Slardar slithers ahead, moving significantly faster and passing through units. Slardar gains movement speed bonus while in the river.

scepter.desc: Provides additional HP Regen, Armor and Status Resistance while in a puddle or in the river.

upgrades.name: Slithereen Crush
upgrades.desc: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy land units.  After the stun, the affected units are slowed.

shard.desc: Causes Slithereen Crush to apply Corrosive Haze for 5 seconds to units affected. Increases radius by 75.

scepter.desc: Whenever Slardar casts Slithereen Crush, he creates a puddle of water that is considered a river for movement and bonuses.

upgrades.name: Pounce
upgrades.desc: Slark leaps forward, grabbing the first hero he connects with.  That unit is leashed, and can only move a limited distance away from Slark's landing position.

scepter.desc: Provides 2 charges and increases pounce range.

upgrades.name: Assassinate
upgrades.desc: Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit and, after a short aiming duration, fires a devastating shot that deals damage at long range and mini-stuns the target.

scepter.desc: Causes Assassinate to fire quicker and disable the enemy target.

upgrades.name: Charge of Darkness
upgrades.desc: Spirit Breaker fixes his sight on an enemy unit and starts charging through all objects.  All enemy units passed through and the targeted unit will be hit by a Greater Bash.  If the targeted unit dies, Spirit Breaker will change his target to the nearest enemy unit to that location.

scepter.desc: Increases Charge of Darkness movement speed and reduces cooldown.

upgrades.name: Electric Vortex
upgrades.desc: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location.

scepter.desc: Electric Vortex affects all enemies within a radius around Storm Spirit.

upgrades.name: Storm Hammer
upgrades.desc: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units in a small area around the target.

shard.desc: Storm Hammer now applies a dispel on enemies and reduces cooldown by 4 seconds.

scepter.desc: Increases cast range and transports Sven along the storm hammer.

upgrades.name: Proximity Mines
upgrades.desc: Plant an invisible mine that cannot be detected by True Sight, but is visible if an enemy is within the active 400 AoE of the mine. Mines detonate if an enemy is standing within the active AoE for 1.6000000238419 seconds. The explosion deals full damage in the blast radius, and deals 25% damage to buildings.

scepter.desc: Increases cast range.

upgrades.name: Stasis Trap
upgrades.desc: Plant an invisible trap that roots nearby enemy units instantly when triggered.

scepter.desc: Increases cast range.

upgrades.name: Remote Mines
upgrades.desc: Plant an invisible explosive that will only detonate after a brief delay when triggered.  Does not damage buildings.

scepter.desc: Increases damage and cast range. Allows Minefield Sign to hide any Proximity Mines, Stasis Traps, and Remote Mines in an area around the sign from True Sight.

upgrades.name: Gush
upgrades.desc: Summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing their movement speed and armor.

scepter.desc: Gush becomes a ground targeted wave ability that affects enemy units in a line.  Decreases cooldown.

upgrades.name: Laser
upgrades.desc: Fires an intense energy beam, dealing damage and blinding the target, causing it to miss all physical attacks.

scepter.desc: Upgrades Tinker's Laser into a Shrink Ray, granting +400 cast range and reducing the enemy hero's size and current health by 15% (stacking). The laser bounces once on the farthest target up to 700 range from the primary one, prioritizing heroes.

upgrades.name: Whirling Axes (Ranged)
upgrades.desc: Troll hurls a fistful of five axes in a cone shape over 950 range, slowing and damaging enemy units.

scepter.desc: Causes Ranged Axes to dispel enemies. Reduces cooldown and manacost.

upgrades.name: Whirling Axes (Melee)
upgrades.desc: Troll hurls two axes around him in a close range area of effect, damaging enemy units and causing them to miss some attacks.

scepter.desc: Causes Melee Axes to dispel Troll Warlord. Reduces cooldown and manacost.

upgrades.name: Dark Rift
upgrades.desc: Opens a dark rift at the targeted friendly unit's or building's position.  After a short delay, Underlord and all nearby friendly heroes are teleported to that unit's location.  Dark Rift can be cancelled at anytime during the cast.  If it is cancelled in this way or the target unit dies before the spell becomes active, Dark Rift goes into cooldown.

scepter.desc: Dark Rift has two charges and can be cast on allied heroes. Reduces cast delay by 1 second.

upgrades.name: Decay
upgrades.desc: Undying steals strength from all enemy heroes in an area, dealing base damage as he claims the enemy's strength for himself.

shard.desc: Increases Decay radius by 100 and spawns a zombie around each hero target.

scepter.desc: Increases strength steal.

upgrades.name: Enrage
upgrades.desc:
Ursa goes into a frenzy, providing damage reduction and status resistance. Removes any existing debuffs.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

scepter.desc: Reduces cooldown and allows Ursa to use Enrage while disabled.

upgrades.name: Vengeance Aura
upgrades.desc: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases the damage of nearby friendly heroes.

scepter.desc: Upon death, creates a strong illusion of Vengeful Spirit that deals and takes 100% damage and can cast all of her spells. Illusion has 25% movement speed bonus. If the illusion is alive when Vengeful Spirit respawn, she will take its place. XP earned by her illusion is given to her.

upgrades.name: Poison Nova
upgrades.desc: A spreading ring of poison that does damage over time to enemy units around Venomancer.  Poison Nova cannot deal lethal damage; targets will be left with at least 1 health.

scepter.desc: Increases damage and decreases cooldown.

upgrades.name: Viper Strike
upgrades.desc: Viper slows the targeted enemy unit's movement and attack speed while also dealing poison damage over time.  The slowing effect reduces over the duration of the poison.

scepter.desc: Decreases mana cost and cooldown. Increases cast range.

upgrades.name: Resonant Pulse
upgrades.desc: Void Spirit wraps himself in a protective shield that absorbs physical damage and emits a single damaging pulse around him. The shield gains increased damage absorption for each enemy hero the pulse hits.

scepter.desc: Causes Resonant Pulse to silence and gain two charges.

upgrades.name: Chaotic Offering
upgrades.desc: Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for one second. The Golem lives 60 seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack.

scepter.desc: Calls 2 Golems with reduced stats and bounty.

upgrades.name: Time Lapse
upgrades.desc:
Weaver warps backward to whatever position it was in five seconds earlier--regaining the HP and mana from that time. No effect on cooldown, gold or experience.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

scepter.desc: Reduces cooldown, and allows Weaver to cast Time Lapse on an ally.

upgrades.name: Windrun
upgrades.desc: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks, while slowing movement of nearby enemies.

scepter.desc: Grants 2 charges to Windrun and grants haste movement speed. Passively provides 30% Evasion.

upgrades.name: Arctic Burn
upgrades.desc: Winter Wyvern soars upon an arctic wind, granting her unobstructed movement and allowing her to exhale a blistering chill into each attack. While soaring, her attacks travel further and faster, and slow enemies with a magical freeze that strips them of 6% of their current health each second. Her sight is also hardened against night's chill, granting her 400 additional vision range at night while soaring.

scepter.desc: Causes Arctic Burn to be a toggle ability, draining mana every second when active. Removes limit on number of attacks per target. Increases Winter Wyvern's movement speed.

upgrades.name: Death Ward
upgrades.desc: CHANNELED - Summons a deadly ward to attack enemy heroes within it's attack range. Lasts a maximum of 8 seconds.

scepter.desc: Death Ward attacks have True Strike and bounce between nearby enemies.

upgrades.name: Reincarnation
upgrades.desc: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle.  Upon death, enemy units in a 900 radius will be slowed.

shard.desc: Causes Reincarnation to have no mana cost and spawn three skeletons to attack each nearby enemy hero when Reincarnation is triggered.

scepter.desc: If a nearby allied hero is slain, they will be transformed into a wraith and have their death delayed for 7 seconds. Buffs the transformed units with +70 attack speed and +25% movement speed.

abilities.name: Blink Fragment
abilities.desc: Blinks an illusion at the target enemy or location and attack them for 7 seconds. Counterspell is replicated on the Blink Fragment illusion.

abilities.name: Burning Army
abilities.desc: Clinkz summons an army of fiery ranged skeleton archers. Archers are immobile and die with 2 attacks from a hero. Skeletons deal a percentage of Clinkz' damage, use his current Searing Arrows ability and attack only heroes. Attack range is equal to Clinkz's attack range.

abilities.name: Overclocking
abilities.desc: Resets Clockwerk's ability cooldowns and grants him bonus movement and attack speed for a duration. Clockwerk becomes stunned after the duration runs out.

abilities.name: Enchant Remnant
