abilities.desc: Earth Spirit temporarily enchants a hero, granting them the properties of a Stone Remnant. After a short duration the remnant shatters, releasing the hero and damaging nearby enemies. Can be cast on Earth Remnants. Has a 5 second cooldown when used that way.

abilities.name: Sproink
abilities.desc: Leaps backward, dodges incoming projectiles, and launches an Impetus attack on the 3 furthest enemy units within Enchantress' attack range + 200.

abilities.name: Dark Portrait
abilities.desc: Creates an ink illusion of a target enemy hero. Illusion is spell immune, and has bonus movement speed and attack damage.

abilities.name: Swiftslash
abilities.desc: Performs a mini Omnislash for a short duration.

abilities.name: Will-O-Wisp
abilities.desc: Summons Ignis Fatuus at the targeted area. Alternates on and off, drawing enemies closer with its mesmerising flicker.

abilities.name: Nihilism
abilities.desc: Causes all nearby enemies in 450 AoE to turn ethereal, preventing them from attacking, causing them to take 30% more magic damage and be slowed by 30% for 4 seconds. Increases Leshrac's speed rather than reducing it. Does not cause you to take amplified damage.

abilities.name: Wolf Bite
abilities.desc: Lycan bites an ally, granting them Shapeshift properties. Lycan and the bitten target gain 30% Lifesteal and share 30% Lifesteal with each other as long as they are within 1200 range of each other.

abilities.name: Burrow
abilities.desc: Nyx Assassin buries himself beneath the battlefield over a short duration. Once burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast, the range of Mana Burn and Impale is increased, and Impale's cooldown is decreased. While burrowed, Nyx Assassin is stationary, unable to attack, and invisible. His health and mana regeneration are also increased, and he gains damage reduction from all damage sources.

abilities.name: Gobble Up
abilities.desc: Mortimer gobbles up a creep or an allied hero, which he can then spit towards enemies. The unit stays in his belly up to 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Shadow Step
abilities.desc: Allows Spectre to perform a single target unit Haunt. Casts a Spectral Dagger on the target.

abilities.name: Psionic Projection
abilities.desc: Allows Templar Assassin to teleport to any Psionic Trap after a brief channel. Does not break meld. Detonates the Psionic Trap on arrival.

abilities.name: Second Chakram
abilities.desc: Fires a secondary saw blade at the target location where it will spin in place, dealing damage in an area around it.  Additionally, for each 5% of health missing, enemies caught in the saw blade move more slowly. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted.  While active the ability costs mana, and Timbersaw loses the ability to attack.

abilities.name: Eyes In The Forest
abilities.desc: Treant Protector enchants a tree, which grants him unobstructed vision in that location. If Overgrowth is cast, units within a radius of an enchanted tree will be entangled and damaged. Passively causes all trees to respawn much faster.

abilities.name: Walrus Kick
abilities.desc: Kicks the closest enemy unit in a targeted direction, stunning and damaging them.

abilities.name: Nimbus
abilities.desc: Creates a storm cloud anywhere on the map that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on nearby enemies.

upgrades.name: Mist Coil
upgrades.desc: Abaddon releases a coil of deathly mist that can damage an enemy unit or heal a friendly unit at the cost of some of Abaddon's health.

shard.desc: Causes Mist Coil to apply a Curse of Avernus stack on enemies. Lowers Cooldown for Mist Coil by 1.

upgrades.name: Aphotic Shield
upgrades.desc:
Summons dark energies around an ally unit, creating a shield that absorbs a set amount of damage before expiring. When the shield is destroyed it will burst and deal damage equal to the amount it could absorb to an area around it. Removes certain types of negative buffs and stuns on cast.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

shard.desc: Causes Aphotic Shield to apply a Curse of Avernus stack on enemies. Lowers Cooldown for Aphotic Shield by 1.

upgrades.name: Curse of Avernus
upgrades.desc: Abaddon strikes an enemy, slowing the target's movement speed. If the target gets hit 4 times, they become affected by a chilling curse causing them to be silenced and slowed, and all attacks against them gain an attack speed boost.

shard.desc: Causes Mist Coil and Aphotic Shield to apply a Curse of Avernus stack on enemies. Increase base slow by 10%. Lowers Cooldown for Mist Coil and Aphotic Shield by 1 second.

upgrades.name: Ice Vortex
upgrades.desc: Creates a vortex of icy energy that slows and increases magic damage done to enemies in its range.

shard.desc: Causes Ice Vortex to deal 40 DPS and reduces attack speed by 20.

upgrades.name: Blink
upgrades.desc: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.

shard.desc: Increases range by 300 and reduces cooldown by 2.

upgrades.name: Magnetic Field
upgrades.desc: Generates a circular distortion field of magnetic energy that protects allied heroes and buildings within it by evading attacks coming from outside the field.

shard.desc: Magnetic Field now pushes enemies out of the area at cast time, and provides allies in it with +40% Magic Resistance. Slows enemies inside by 20%.

upgrades.name: Counter Helix
upgrades.desc: When attacked, Axe has a chance to perform a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.

shard.desc: Causes Axe's attacks to have a chance to proc a Counter Helix. Attack procs ignore Counter Helix cooldown. Increases attack speed by 35 and proc chance by 5%.

upgrades.name: Brain Sap
upgrades.desc: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, healing Bane and dealing damage.

shard.desc: Causes Brain Sap to become a 550 AoE spell. Secondary targets only heal for 25%.

upgrades.name: Flamebreak
upgrades.desc: Hurls an explosive cocktail that explodes when it reaches the target location, knocking back, and dealing damage over time to enemies in the area.

shard.desc: Causes Flamebreak to have two charges and apply a Sticky Napalm charge on impact.

upgrades.name: Bloodrage
upgrades.desc: Drives Bloodseeker into a bloodthirsty rage which causes him to attack faster and deal more spell damage at the cost of a percentage of his health per second. Provides half attack speed to allied heroes.

shard.desc: Bloodrage attacks now deal 2% of the target’s max health as pure damage and heals Bloodseeker for that amount. Only works for Bloodseeker.

upgrades.name: Shadow Walk
upgrades.desc: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability.  If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will slow the target's movement speed.

shard.desc: Shadow Walk now grants you 35% damage reduction while invisible. Attacking out of invisibility stuns the target for 1 second. Lowers cooldown by 5 seconds.

upgrades.name: Primal Split
upgrades.desc: Splits Brewmaster into elements, forming 3 specialized warriors, adept at survival, each with their own abilities. If any of them survive until the end of their summoned timer, the Brewmaster is reborn.

shard.desc: Primal Split now creates a Void brewling. Has Astral Pulse ability, affecting enemies in 500 AoE. Applies a 20/30/40% slow and Disarm for 2 seconds.

scepter.desc: Primal Split has 2 charges and can be canceled at any time. Charge replenish time is equal to the normal cooldown.

upgrades.name: Double Edge
upgrades.desc: Centaur strikes a mighty blow at melee range, damaging both himself and a small area around the target. Deals extra damage based on your strength. Centaur cannot die from Double Edge.

shard.desc: Causes Double Edge to increase Centaur's strength by 15% per hero hit for 15 seconds. Duration refreshes per stack. Max 5 Stacks. Slows enemies by 25% for 2 seconds.

upgrades.name: Chaos Bolt
upgrades.desc: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.

shard.desc: Chaos Bolt creates a Phantasm illusion attacking the target for 6 seconds. Increases cast range by 300.

upgrades.name: Divine Favor
upgrades.desc: Passively provides an aura that grants increased health regeneration and amplifies all health restore by a percentage.

shard.desc: Allows Divine Favor to be cast on allies, teleporting them back home after 6 seconds. Cannot target Spell Immune Allies. Cast Range: 600

upgrades.name: Skeleton Walk
upgrades.desc: Clinkz moves invisibly through units until the moment he attacks or uses items.

shard.desc: Causes Skeleton Walk to create two Burning Army Skeletons.

upgrades.name: Freezing Field
upgrades.desc: CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage. Grants bonus armor while channeling. Lasts 10 seconds.

shard.desc: Allows you to move, cast and attack during Freezing Field. Can still be interrupted by enemies. You move 75% slower during this.

scepter.desc: Applies Frostbite to any unit that has been standing in the Freezing Field for over a set amount of time.

upgrades.name: Cursed Crown
upgrades.desc: Dark Willow casts an ancient fae curse on the target. After a delay, the target and nearby enemies are stunned.

shard.desc: Cursed Crown creates four brambles around the target after the counter ends. Triggers even upon dispel. Reduces cooldown by 2 seconds and stun delay by 1 second.

upgrades.name: Poison Touch
upgrades.desc: Releases a cone of poison that strikes multiple enemy units. Deals damage over time and slows the targets. Anytime the targets get attacked, the debuff duration is refreshed.

shard.desc: Causes Poison Touch to hex affected targets for 1.25 seconds.

upgrades.name: Spirit Siphon
upgrades.desc: Creates a spirit link between Death Prophet and an enemy unit, draining 14 + 1% Max HP per second from the enemy.

shard.desc: Increases Spirit Siphon charges by 1 and causes enemies to be feared for 2 seconds if they are siphoned for 4 seconds consecutively.

upgrades.name: Thunder Strike
upgrades.desc: Repeatedly strikes the targeted unit with lightning.  Each strike damages nearby enemy units in a small radius and slows enemy movement and attack speed by 100% for 0.10000000149012 seconds.  Provides vision of its target.

shard.desc: Allows Thunder Strike to be cast on allies, follows the ally and deals damage around them. Each strike gives a short 1.25 second buff that provides +50% Movement Speed and +75 Attack Speed. Increases radius to 650.

upgrades.name: Infernal Blade
upgrades.desc: Doom swings his burning sword, igniting the enemy. Stuns for 0.60000002384186 seconds and applies a 4 second burn that deals a base damage plus a percentage of the target's Max HP as damage per second.

shard.desc: Infernal Blade stun duration is increased from 0.6 to 1.2 seconds. If the enemy's level is a multiple of 3, or above level 24, they will be stunned for an additional 0.6 seconds and take 150 bonus damage.

upgrades.name: Frost Arrows
upgrades.desc: Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement and dealing bonus damage.  Slow lasts 1.5 seconds.

shard.desc: Frost Arrows now apply a Hypothermia stack to enemy heroes, reducing their regeneration by 10% per stack. Increases damage by 5 per stack. Lasts 7 seconds. If an enemy hero dies with Hypothermia stacks, they burst and deal 60 magic damage per stack and 40% slow for 2 seconds to enemies within 650 radius. Max Stacks: 7

upgrades.name: Magnetize
upgrades.desc: Magnetizes units in a small nearby area, causing them to take damage for a short duration. Magnetized heroes cause nearby Stone Remnants to explode, destroying the remnant and refreshing Magnetize's duration on all nearby enemies. This process can repeat multiple times. If an enemy hero is affected by Geomagnetic Grip or Boulder Smash, all magnetized heroes share the effects.

shard.desc: Causes Stone Remnant to provide 375 ground vision. Increases charge count by 4.

upgrades.name: Fissure
upgrades.desc: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.

shard.desc: Reduces Fissure cooldown by 2 seconds and allows Earthshaker to walk on it. When he casts any ability, an Aftershock is released along its path that stuns for half the duration.

upgrades.name: Echo Stomp
upgrades.desc: Elder Titan and his Astral Spirit both stomp the ground, damaging and knocking nearby enemy units unconscious around their locations.  The Elder Titan stomp deals physical damage, while the Spirit stomp deals magical damage.

shard.desc: Allows you to switch Echo Stomp to autocast. When cast while on autocast, Elder Titan will take the place of the Astral Spirit as it completes its stomp.

upgrades.name: Fire Remnant
upgrades.desc: Ember Spirit generates Fire Remnant charges every 38 seconds, with a max of 3 charges. Releasing a charge sends a Fire Remnant that runs to the target location at 250% Ember Spirit's speed.  Using Activate Fire Remnant, Ember Spirit can dash out to his Remnants, dealing damage along the way and exploding them upon arrival.  The targeted Remnant will be arrived at last.

shard.desc: Fire Remnants deal 45 damage per second in a 600 AoE around them. If an enemy hero dies within 400 range of Ember Spirit, a Fire Remnant charge will be replenished.

scepter.desc: Increases cast range, initial remnant speed, and maximum charges. Activate Fire Remnant costs less mana.

upgrades.name: Nature's Attendants
upgrades.desc: A cloud of wisps heals Enchantress and any friendly units nearby. Lasts 12 seconds.

shard.desc: Adds 3 permanent Nature's Attendants that follow Enchantress around.

upgrades.name: Black Hole
upgrades.desc: CHANNELED - Summons a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units.  Enemies affected by Black Hole cannot move, attack, or cast spells.

shard.desc: Black Hole does a non-interrupting pull towards it in a 1200 AoE. Pulls at a rate of 175.

scepter.desc: Adds the current level of Midnight Pulse to Black Hole.

upgrades.name: Time Walk
upgrades.desc: Rushes to a target location while backtracking any damage taken the last 2 seconds.

shard.desc: Grants Reverse Time Walk and increases Time Walk cast range by 400.

scepter.desc: Applies a Time Lock proc to all units at the landing destination.

upgrades.name: Ink Swell
upgrades.desc: Grimstroke shrouds an allied unit in ink, increasing its movement speed. Enemies in range of the allied unit are damaged with inky tendrils over time. After 3 seconds it triggers, applying damage and stun in an area around the unit in proportion to how long ink tendril was near any hero.

shard.desc: Causes Ink Swell to deal 40% more damage and heal the target for 40% of the damage Ink Swell deals. Upon expiration, the target will receive a strong dispell.

upgrades.name: Rocket Barrage
upgrades.desc: Launches a salvo of rockets at nearby enemy units in a radius around the Gyrocopter.  Lasts 3 seconds.

shard.desc: Rocket Barrage hits an extra target and increases duration by 1 second.

upgrades.name: Inner Fire
upgrades.desc: In a fiery rage, knocks all nearby enemies away from you to a fixed distance, dealing damage and disarming them.

shard.desc: Causes Inner Fire to reduce healing and regeneration by 50% and applies a 40% movement speed slow. Lowers cooldown by 3 seconds. Can be cast while disabled.

upgrades.name: Tether
upgrades.desc: Tethers Io to an allied unit, granting bonus movement speed to both. When Io restores health or mana, tethered units target gains a larger portion of that amount. The tether breaks when the allied unit moves too far away, or Io cancels the tether.

shard.desc: Tether stuns enemies touching it for 1.75 seconds and deals 150 damage. Does not affect the same unit more than once every 7 seconds. Increases movement speed bonus by 10%.

upgrades.name: Blade Fury
upgrades.desc:
Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units. 

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

shard.desc: Increases movement speed during Blade Fury by 100 and attacks a random nearby unit once per second dealing 75% damage.

upgrades.name: Press The Attack
upgrades.desc:
Removes debuffs and disables from the target friendly unit, and grants bonus attack speed and health regen for a short time.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

shard.desc: Press The Attack targets now gain Spell Immunity for 1.75 seconds. Reduces cooldown by 2 seconds.

upgrades.name: Split Earth
upgrades.desc: Splits the earth under enemies. Deals damage and stuns for a short duration.

shard.desc: Causes Split Earth to repeat in the same location three additional times, with a 5 second delay between each one. Each time the radius increases by 75. Split Earth echo location is visible to both teams.

upgrades.name: Laguna Blade
upgrades.desc: Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.

shard.desc: Increases Laguna Blade's cast range by 250 and causes it to go the full cast length and hit all units along the way. Can be ground targeted.

scepter.desc: Changes Laguna Blade's damage type to Pure, and allows it to slice through spell immunity.

upgrades.name: Mana Drain
upgrades.desc: CHANNELED - Absorbs the magical energies of a target enemy unit by taking mana from it every second.

shard.desc: Causes Mana Drain to affect up to three enemies. You become Spell Immune while channeling.

upgrades.name: Savage Roar
upgrades.desc: Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear roar fiercely causing nearby enemies to flee towards their base in terror. Their movement speed is increased by 20%.

shard.desc: Savage Roar now empowers allies in 700 AoE with +20% Movement Speed and +60 Attack Speed for 5 seconds. Applies a basic dispel. Replicates between Lone Druid and Spirit Bear regardless of castability on the other.

upgrades.name: Lucent Beam
upgrades.desc: Calls a beam of lunar energy down upon an enemy, damaging and briefly stunning them.

shard.desc: Allows Lucent beam to be ground targeted with a 325 target search radius. Also releases attacks on up to two random targets within 500 range of the Lucent Beam. Reduces mancost by 50.

upgrades.name: Summon Wolves
upgrades.desc: Summons two wolves to fight for Lycan.  Level 3-4 wolves have Permanent Invisibility, and level 4 wolves have Cripple.

shard.desc: Causes one of your creep waves to include one uncontrollable wolf that moves with the wave.

upgrades.name: Spear of Mars
upgrades.desc: Mars throws his legendary Spear with deadly precision, damaging each enemy unit it strikes. The first enemy hero it hits is skewered on the spear, pushing it back. If a skewered hero hits a tree, building, or cliff, they will be impaled to it and stunned.

shard.desc: Spear of Mars impales up to two units and leaves a fire trail behind for 10 seconds. Deals 35 damage per second and slows by 20%. Debuff lingers for 2 seconds.

upgrades.name: Poof
upgrades.desc: Drawing mystical energies from the earth, a Meepo can teleport to another Meepo or itself after channeling for 1.5 seconds, dealing damage in both the departure and arrival locations.

shard.desc: Allows you to Poof to allies within 2000 range.

upgrades.name: Leap
upgrades.desc: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering herself with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 2.5 seconds.

shard.desc: Grants +1 Leap Charge. Leap buff grants Mirana 1.5x Critical Strike attacks for its duration.

upgrades.name: Tree Dance
upgrades.desc: Monkey King jumps to a tree and perches atop it. While perched, he gains the Primal Spring ability-a channeled leap attack. If Monkey King's tree is destroyed, he falls and is stunned for 4 seconds. Taking damage from player controlled units or Roshan while on the ground puts Tree Dance on cooldown.

shard.desc: Reduces cooldown to 0.3 and cast point to 0.1.

upgrades.name: Adaptive Strike (Agility)
upgrades.desc:
Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, dealing base damage plus additional damage based on Morphling's agility times a multiplier.  If Morphling's agility is 50% higher than strength, the maximum agility multiplier is used. 

 Also puts Adaptive Strike (Strength) on a 3 second cooldown.

shard.desc: Causes Adaptive Strike to have +1 Multishot and increases the stun duration by 1 second. Multishot prioritizes heroes.

upgrades.name: Adaptive Strike (Strength)
upgrades.desc:
Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, stunning and knocking back the target based on Morphling's strength. If his strength is 50% higher than his agility, the maximum stun/knockback is dealt. 

 Also puts Adaptive Strike (Agility) on a 3 second cooldown.

shard.desc: Causes Adaptive Strike to have +1 Multishot and increases the stun duration by 1 second. Multishot prioritizes heroes.

upgrades.name: Rip Tide
upgrades.desc: The Naga Siren and her images have a chance on attack to hit all nearby units with a damaging wave of water that lowers armor for 4 seconds.

shard.desc: Adds 20% slow and increases the base armor reduction by 4.

upgrades.name: Sprout
upgrades.desc: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, trapping it in place, and providing vision in a 500 radius.

shard.desc: Causes the first two trees destroyed with Sprout to summon Greater Treants. Can only have two Greater Treants alive.

upgrades.name: Hunter in the Night
upgrades.desc: Night Stalker is in his element at night, attacking and moving with great swiftness.

shard.desc: Night Stalker can cast Hunter in the Night. Consumes a creep, instantly killing it and restoring 35% of Night Stalker's maximum HP and and 25% of maximum mana. Cannot target ancients during the daytime. Cooldown: 20

upgrades.name: Vendetta
upgrades.desc: Allows Nyx Assassin to become invisible and gain a speed bonus.  If Nyx Assassin attacks to break the invisibility, massive bonus damage is dealt with the attack.

shard.desc: Causes Nyx's Vendetta attack to reduce enemy magic resistance by 20% for 4 seconds. Also increases Vendetta movement speed by 25%.

upgrades.name: False Promise
upgrades.desc:
Temporarily alters an ally's destiny, delaying any healing or damage taken until False Promise ends. Any healing that is delayed by False Promise is doubled. Removes most negative status effects and disables on initial cast.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

shard.desc: Causes False Promise to have a 0.15-second fade delay invisibility.

upgrades.name: Essence Flux
upgrades.desc: Passively grants you a chance to restore a percentage of your max mana each time you cast an ability.

shard.desc: Essence Flux becomes castable ability with 0.75 cast time. Swaps Outworld Destroyer's current Life and Mana totals. Cooldown: 45

upgrades.name: Spirit Lance
upgrades.desc: Sends a magical spirit lance to a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while summoning an illusory phantom to attack the unit.

shard.desc: Spirit Lance bounces once on an enemy within 750 radius, prioritizing heroes. Increases Spirit Lance illusion damage by +40%.

upgrades.name: Sun Ray
upgrades.desc: Phoenix expels a beam of light at the cost of its own health. The beam damages enemies and heals allies for a base amount plus a percentage of their health. The percentage increases as the beam continues to fire.

shard.desc: Allows Sun Ray to be cast during Supernova. Slows enemies by 12%.

upgrades.name: Waning Rift
upgrades.desc: Puck teleports to the target location and releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.

shard.desc: Waning Rift now deals 70 bonus damage and knocks enemies back 250 distance over 0.4 seconds (non-interrupting). Reveals invisible enemy units and wards in the area for 5 seconds.

upgrades.name: Dismember
upgrades.desc: CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Pudge gets healed for the same amount he damages. Lasts longer on creeps.

shard.desc: Allows targeting an ally to swallow them and heal them for 6% of their max health per second. Reduces cooldown by 10 seconds.

upgrades.name: Life Drain
upgrades.desc:
CHANNELED - When cast on an enemy, Pugna drains health from the target enemy unit to heal himself and granting vision over the target. If Pugna has full HP, and the enemy target is a Hero, Life Drain will restore mana instead.

When cast on an ally, Pugna will drain his own health into his ally.

shard.desc: For every 1.5 seconds of channel, another secondary Life Drain is created targeting another random enemy hero.

scepter.desc: Removes cooldown and increases damage.

upgrades.name: Blink
upgrades.desc: Short distance teleportation that allows Queen of Pain to move in and out of combat.

shard.desc: Releases a sonic boom when Queen of Pain blinks, at both her starting and ending locations. Deals 175 damage in a 300 AoE and silences for 1.75 seconds.

upgrades.name: Storm Surge
upgrades.desc: Passively increases Razor's movement speed.

shard.desc: Causes Storm Surge to have an 18% chance when attacked, and always when targeted with a spell, to release forked lightning that strikes the target and up to 2 other enemies. Deals 150 Damage and slows them by 50% for 1.5 seconds.

upgrades.name: Telekinesis
upgrades.desc: Rubick uses his telekinetic powers to lift the enemy into the air briefly and then hurls them back at the ground. The unit lands on the ground with such force that it stuns nearby enemies.

shard.desc: Allows you to target yourself or allies with Telekinesis. Throw range is 85% longer and cooldown is reduced by 30% when targeting allies. Throw delay reduced to 0.5 seconds.

upgrades.name: Epicenter
upgrades.desc: CHANNELED - After channeling for 2 seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.

shard.desc: Every 700 units moved causes an Epicenter Pulse around Sand King in 475 AoE.

upgrades.name: Demonic Purge
upgrades.desc:
Purges the target enemy unit, removing positive buffs, and slowing the target for the duration.  The unit slowly regains its speed until the end of the duration, upon which damage is dealt.  Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Demonic Purge.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

shard.desc: Allows Demonic Purge to be cast on allies, continuously dispelling them and healing for its damage values. Does not slow allies.

scepter.desc: Cooldown is removed, replaced with 3 charges that replenish every 60 seconds. Also causes Demonic Purge to break its target's passive abilities while active.

upgrades.name: Presence of the Dark Lord
upgrades.desc: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies.

shard.desc: Lowers nearby enemy magic resistance by 14%.

upgrades.name: Shackles
upgrades.desc: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, while dealing damage over time.

shard.desc: Shackles creates 4 Serpent Wards attacking the target. Increases Shackles cast range by 125. Lasts 7 seconds.

upgrades.name: Glaives of Wisdom
upgrades.desc: Silencer enchants his glaives with his wisdom, dealing additional damage based on his Intelligence. Silencer temporarily steals his target's Intelligence with each hit.

shard.desc: Causes Glaives to bounce once towards the closest enemy unit, dealing 50% of Silencer's attack damage. Bounce range is 600.

upgrades.name: Slithereen Crush
upgrades.desc: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy land units.  After the stun, the affected units are slowed.

shard.desc: Causes Slithereen Crush to apply Corrosive Haze for 5 seconds to units affected. Increases radius by 75.

scepter.desc: Whenever Slardar casts Slithereen Crush, he creates a puddle of water that is considered a river for movement and bonuses.

upgrades.name: Scatterblast
upgrades.desc: Snapfire unloads with a wide blast that damages and slows enemies in a cone. Enemies caught at point-blank range take an extra 50% damage.

shard.desc: Causes Scatterblast to knock units back in the point blank range for 250 units, dealing 125 extra damage and stunning for 2 seconds.

upgrades.name: Dispersion
upgrades.desc: Damage done to Spectre is reflected on her enemies, leaving her unharmed. The effect lessens with distance.

shard.desc: Can cast Dispersion on a hero that damaged you in the last 8 seconds.  Illusion lasts 5 seconds. Cooldown: 25

upgrades.name: Nether Strike
upgrades.desc: Spirit Breaker slips into the nether realm, reappearing next to his hapless victim. Upon reappearing, a Greater Bash of the current level occurs and deals bonus damage. Knocks back for double the normal distance.

shard.desc: Causes Nether Strike to deal 200 extra damage, and apply a 4-second break. Grants you Spell Immunity for 2 seconds.

upgrades.name: Overload
upgrades.desc: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on Storm's next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.

shard.desc: Can be activated to grant Storm Spirit and allied heroes within 750 AoE of him 3 Overload charges. Provides 40 Attack Speed. Lasts up to 12 seconds or until the charges are depleted.

upgrades.name: Storm Hammer
upgrades.desc: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units in a small area around the target.

shard.desc: Storm Hammer now applies a dispel on enemies and reduces cooldown by 4 seconds.

scepter.desc: Increases cast range and transports Sven along the storm hammer.

upgrades.name: Blast Off!
upgrades.desc: Techies hurtle themselves into the enemy's midst, detonating charges upon impact which deal massive area of effect damage and silence enemies. Upon landing, the assault deals Techies damage equal to 50% of their max health.

shard.desc: Increases Blast Off! cast range by 300 and applies a 1.75 second stun to affected enemies.

upgrades.name: Psionic Trap
upgrades.desc: Templar Assassin places mystical traps that invisibly monitor enemy movement. When sprung at her command, they exert a slowing influence of 30% in the area. Traps charge up to slow 60% after 4 seconds. Deals bonus damage when fully charged.

shard.desc: Causes Psionic Traps to silence enemies for up to 3.5 seconds based on how long the trap has been charged. Increases max trap count by 4 and vision by 125.

upgrades.name: Anchor Smash
upgrades.desc: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to attack and deal bonus damage to nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.

shard.desc: Increases Anchor Smash damage by 90 and causes it to affect buildings. Reduces cooldown by 1 second.

upgrades.name: Tree Grab
upgrades.desc: Grabs a tree to whack enemies on the head for a limited number of attacks. Grants bonus attack range. Attacks deal more damage and fully splash on units along the way. The tree can be thrown, to deal your attack to a unit at a distance.

shard.desc: Causes Tree Grab to have no charge limit.

upgrades.name: Firestorm
upgrades.desc: Calls down waves of fire that damage enemy units in the target area, burning for additional damage over time.

shard.desc: Firestorm can be self-targeted. When used that way, the Firestorm follows Underlord around. Increases the wave count by 3. Reduces cast point by half.

upgrades.name: Decay
upgrades.desc: Undying steals strength from all enemy heroes in an area, dealing base damage as he claims the enemy's strength for himself.

shard.desc: Increases Decay radius by 100 and spawns a zombie around each hero target.

scepter.desc: Increases strength steal.

upgrades.name: Earthshock
upgrades.desc: Ursa leaps forward 250 units and slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for 4 seconds.

shard.desc: Causes Earthshock to apply a 1.5 second Enrage buff on yourself. Reduces cooldown by 1 seconds.

upgrades.name: Wave of Terror
upgrades.desc: Vengeful Spirit lets loose a wicked cry, weakening the armor of enemies and giving vision of the path ahead.

shard.desc: Wave of Terror steals 20% of enemy hero base damage and base armor, granting it to Vengeful Spirit for the debuff duration.

upgrades.name: Venomous Gale
upgrades.desc: Launches a ball of venom in a line, poisoning enemy units so that they take both initial damage and damage over time, as well as suffering slowed movement.  Venomous Gale deals damage every 3 seconds over its duration.

shard.desc: Causes Venomous Gale to summon two Plague Wards when it impacts an enemy hero. Increases travel range by 400.

upgrades.name: Poison Attack
upgrades.desc: Intensifies Viper's venom, adding an effect to his normal attack that applies a stacking movement speed slow and magic resistance deduction while dealing damage over time. Stacks up to 5 times.

shard.desc: Causes Poison Attack to lower armor by 1 per stack and allows it to affect buildings for 40% poison damage. Increases max stacks by 3.

upgrades.name: Gravekeeper's Cloak
upgrades.desc: Visage generates a layered barrier that protects him from damage.  If he receives damage from a player, one layer is removed, and takes time to recover.

shard.desc: Grants Visage the ability to cast Stone Form. Restores up to 35% of your health. Cooldown: 60. Manacost: 125.

upgrades.name: Dissimilate
upgrades.desc: Void Spirit temporarily fades into the aether, creating a number of portals through which he can reassemble himself. Upon exiting a portal, he damages all enemies in the area.

shard.desc: Adds a partial outer ring to Dissimilate. Increases damage by 200.

upgrades.name: Shadow Word
upgrades.desc: Warlock whispers an incantation, healing a friendly unit or damaging an enemy unit over time.

shard.desc: Turns Shadow Word into a 450 AoE Spell. Grants 10% movement speed bonus to allies and slows enemies by 10%.

upgrades.name: The Swarm
upgrades.desc: Weaver launches a swarm of 12 young Weavers that latch on any enemy unit in their path, attacking and reducing armor until it is killed.

shard.desc: Reduces cooldown by 4 seconds. Causes The Swarm to latch onto and reveal invisible units. Causes Geminate attack to launch on other enemies within 1200 range of the target that have Beetles attached to them.

upgrades.name: Powershot
upgrades.desc: Windranger charges her bow for up to 1 second for a single powerful shot, which deals more damage the longer it is charged. The arrow damages enemies along its path. For each enemy that Powershot hits, its damage is reduced by 20%.

shard.desc: Powershot now becomes global, but only hits heroes beyond its default range (max 1 hero). Impacted heroes will be killed if they are under 13% after taking the impact damage. Lowers cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

upgrades.name: Cold Embrace
upgrades.desc: Encases an ally in an icy cocoon, freezing them solid while healing a base amount as well as a percentage of their maximum health each second. The cocoon blocks all physical damage.

shard.desc: When Cold Embrace ends, a Splinter Blast goes off at that location, hitting enemies within 1200 range. Reduces cooldown by 5 seconds.

upgrades.name: Reincarnation
upgrades.desc: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle.  Upon death, enemy units in a 900 radius will be slowed.

shard.desc: Causes Reincarnation to have no mana cost and spawn three skeletons to attack each nearby enemy hero when Reincarnation is triggered.

scepter.desc: If a nearby allied hero is slain, they will be transformed into a wraith and have their death delayed for 7 seconds. Buffs the transformed units with +70 attack speed and +25% movement speed.

upgrades.name: Static Field
upgrades.desc: Zeus shocks any enemy hit by his abilities, causing damage proportional to their current health.

shard.desc: Static Field can be cast to perform a Heavenly Jump, shocking the closest visible enemy (prioritizing heroes) within 2000 range, dealing Static Field damage to them and reducing their movement speed by 100% for 2.5 seconds. If Zeus was moving forward, he will jump towards that direction. Cooldown: 11. Manacost: 100.

abilities.name: Berserk Potion
abilities.desc: Alchemist throws a potion at an ally, applying a basic dispel and giving them 50 Attack Speed and 40 HP regen.Lasts 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Jetpack
abilities.desc: Rises up, granting Clockwerk flying vision, flying movement, and a 20% bonus movement speed. Clockwerk has a severely-limited turn rate during this time and cannot attack. Lasts up to 6 seconds or until he casts Hookshot.

abilities.name: Normal Punch
abilities.desc: Grants Normal Punch. Passive cooldown attack. Causes Dark Seer's next attack on a hero to knock an illusion out of the victim and stun them for up to 2.25 seconds, 350 distance and 250 damage based on how far Dark Seer has moved in the past 3 seconds. Max power is reached after 900 distance moved. Illusions lasts for 5 seconds. Cooldown: 14

abilities.name: Fireball
abilities.desc: Ignites a 450 AoE area for 10 seconds, dealing 80 damage per second to enemies in it. Has reduced cast range when melee.

abilities.name: Reverse Time Walk
abilities.desc: Replaces Time Walk with Reverse Time Walk for 1.5 seconds after landing. If used in this period, you will reverse your time walk back to your previous cast location. Does not affect health or proc scepter hits.

abilities.name: Liquid Frost
abilities.desc: Stuns enemies for 0.40000000596046 seconds and applies a frost debuff that slows enemy movement speed by 20% and take 20 plus 2.5% of their max health per second as damage for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Recall
abilities.desc: After a short delay, teleports the targeted friendly hero to your location.  If the targeted friendly hero takes player based damage during this time, the ability is interrupted.

abilities.name: Tidal Wave
abilities.desc: Releases a Tidal Wave that spawns behind Kunkka. Deals 250 damage and drags enemies along it for 600 distance. Enemies cannot attack while being dragged.

abilities.name: Ice Spire
abilities.desc: Creates an icicle at the target spot for 15 seconds, slowing enemies within 750 range by -30%. Has 800 health.Chain Frost can bounce to the Icicle if there are no other enemies in range.Can cast Frost Shield on it.

abilities.name: Open Wounds
abilities.desc: Lifestealer rends an enemy unit, slowing the victim's movement speed and allowing all allies to regain health for a percentage of the damage they deal to that unit. All damage dealt will steal life, including damage from spells. The victim recovers movement speed over the duration. Deals 2% of the target's max health per attack on the target from real heroes.

abilities.name: Horn Toss
abilities.desc: Magnus tosses any enemies in front of him, launching them to his rear. Enemies spend 0.60000002384186 seconds in the air, then take 200 damage and are stunned for 0.75 seconds upon landing.

abilities.name: Hammer of Purity
abilities.desc: Causes Omniknight's next attack to deal bonus pure damage based on 60 plus 115% of his base damage. He is healed for the same amount of pure damage. Cooldown: 4

abilities.name: Roll Up
abilities.desc: Pangolier curls into an immobile protective ball for up to 4 seconds, gaining magic immunity and allowing him to turn. Can be cast during Rolling Thunder to temporarily hit the brakes. Can cast Rolling Thunder and Shield Crash during Roll Up. If enemies attack Pangolier during this, he will roll away from the attacker for 0.75 seconds, applying Rolling Thunder damage/stun if there are enemies in the way. Cooldown: 30

abilities.name: Fan of Knives
abilities.desc: Phantom Assassin releases sharp blades around her in a 550 AoE, dealing 16% of a victim's max health on impact and applying break for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Sleeping Dart
abilities.desc: Fires a dart at the target enemy, putting them to sleep for 4 seconds or if they take 200 damage. At the end of the duration, the target wakes up and takes 150 damage, and is slowed by 30% for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Depth Shroud
abilities.desc: Creates a 300 AoE cloud at the target location for 3 seconds. All allies inside the radius are hidden and affected by Shadow Dance. Cast Range: 800. Cooldown: 75

abilities.name: Concussive Grenade
abilities.desc: Grants Concussive Grenade. Deals 125 damage, knocking enemies back 425 distance, slowing them by 50% and disarming them for 3 seconds. Radius: 375. Knocks you back 450 units on cast.

abilities.name: Demon Zeal
abilities.desc: Costs 20% of Terrorblade's Current HP to cast, providing him +50 Movement and +50 Attack Speed for 7 seconds. Provides 100% more bonus while melee. Cooldown: 14.

abilities.name: Flamethrower
abilities.desc: Releases a 275 width flame that extends 400 range in the direction Timbersaw is facing. Applies a debuff that deals 90 damage per second and slows by 30%. Affects buildings for 40% damage. Lasts 7 seconds. Debuff lingers for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Defense Matrix
abilities.desc: Targets an allied unit, applying a barrier to them that blocks the next 350 damage and provides 50% Status Resistance. Barrier lasts up to 15 seconds.

abilities.name: Frozen Sigil
abilities.desc: Summons a flying Sigil that slows movement speed by -40% for enemies within 650 radius. Lasts 25 seconds. Cooldown: 30

abilities.name: Voodoo Switcheroo
abilities.desc: Turns Witch Doctor into a Death Ward for 2 seconds. Death Ward has -30 Attack Speed. He is hidden during this time.
